program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de in focus : the road to the final two late extra-time goals kill off germany 's world cup dream zidane 's penalty decides nervous semi as france make final italy make light work of ukraine to meet hosts in semi-finals three off in pulsating but bad tempered us , italy 1-1 draw match reports -pipe- 23.06.2006 france lay world cup ghosts to rest with spot in final 16 großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : france celebrated their first world cup goal since beating brazil in 1998 france answered their critics with a 2-0 win against togo to advance into the round of 16 and claimed their first world cup win in eight years .
switzerland beat south korea to win the group . les bleus finished behind switzerland to earn the second group g spot among the last 16 teams in cologne on friday , winning by the two-goal margin they needed to guarantee a match against spain in the cup 's next round . togo , at their first ever finals , did n't make it easy for the french .
the favored european side failed to convert a hatful of chances in the first 45 minutes , largely thanks to the heroics of kossi agassa in the togo goal . close to the break agassa performed a near miracle to first block florent malouda 's shot then scrambled around to keep out trezeguet 's attempt to knock in the rebound inches from his line . fighting for their world cup lives , raymond domenech 's french side was missing suspended playmaker zinedine zidane and desperately in search of their first world cup win since a 3-0 triumph over brazil eight years ago . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : things were n't always so peaceful on the french team before the game france dig deep for chance to play spain domenech admitted that friday 's game " was difficult and i 'll not deny that .
but this team can dig deep .
i am happy for the team .
the next match against spain will be super . " while france will have felt aggrieved not to be ahead at the break , already knocked out togo fulfilled their promise not to make up the numbers , looking dangerous on the counter attack with french keeper fabian barthez having to move smartly to punch clear a shot from mohamed kader . patrick vieira earned man of the match honors on his 30th birthday , taking a pass from frank ribery 10 minutes into the second half and bending it off his right foot into the corner of the net . six minutes later vieira , who has faced criticism for a disappointing start in germany , headed down the ball thierry henry fired into the goal from the middle of the penalty box . swiss send south korea crashing out of cup bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : the swiss defense proved up to what south korea threw at it a controversial 2-0 victory swept switzerland past south korea and into the round of 16 in hanover at a game that ran simultaneously with the togo-france match-up . arsenal defender philippe senderos put switzerland ahead in the first half before striker alexander frei killed the koreans ' hopes of equalizing with a hotly disputed goal in the 77th minute . the korean defense stopped after the assistant referee flagged frei offside but the striker slid the ball home and was delighted when argentine referee horacio elizondo allowed the goal to stand despite furious protests from the whole south korean team . " we played well over the three games , we did n't concede any goals and we scored four , " an optimistic frei said after the game .
" now we 'll try to conquer the world ! " switzerland , who reached the second round in their last appearance in the world cup finals 12 years ago , play their next match against ukraine . korea nearly caught switzerland cold in the third minute with a sweeping move down the left .
lee chun-soo darted into the box but his low cross was just too strong for the onrushing lee ho . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : senderos , right , will remember the goal - and the elbow to the head elbow to the head ca n't sink swiss the swiss side surged forward looking for an early goal and tranquillo barnetta had a goal-bound shot blocked by a desperate lunge from veteran defender choi jin-cheul in the ninth minute . the pressure paid off for switzerland in the 23rd minute when they went ahead from a set piece .
hakan yakin fired in a left-footed free kick to the back post and arsenal defender senderos rose high to power a header past lee . senderos clashed heads with choi and blood started to stream down his face but the battling 21-year-old was too overjoyed at scoring his third international goal to feel any pain . dw staff -lrb- sms -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de three playing for group g progress while togo play for pride two teams from south korea , switzerland and france have the chance to make the last 16 of the world cup as group g reaches its conclusion friday .
togo , however , know that the flight home is already booked .
-lrb- june 23 , 2006 -rrb- switzerland end togo 's world cup adventure togo 's unlikely dreams of world cup success came to an end on monday in a 2-0 loss to switzerland .
the swiss took over the top spot in group g.
-lrb- june 19 , 2006 -rrb- live ticker : togo 0:2 france review all the highlights from the game with the dw-world.de live ticker .

live ticker : togo 0:2 france -pipe- match reports -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 23.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese for africa romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 04.07.2011 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio about dw-radio what 's on ?
reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 23.06.2006 live ticker : togo 0:2 france review all the highlights from the game with the dw-world.de live ticker . group g final games dw-world.de will follow already out togo against a france who will have to take their last chance to show they are still a team to count on and not just a set of individual quality .
the french must win to go through while switzerland and south-korea could reach the last sixteen with a draw , although it 's unlikely any of the teams will want to risk playing for such a result .
the line-ups .
togo -lrb- 3-5-2 -rrb- : 16-kossi agassa ; 2-dare nibombe , 3-jean paul yaovi abalo dosseh , 5-massamesso tchangai ; 13-richmond forson , 7-moustapha salifou , 18-yao junior senaya , 10-cherif toure mamam , 6-yao aziawanou ; 4-emmanuel adebayor , 17-mohamed kader coubadja .
coach : otto pfister france -lrb- 4-4-2 -rrb- : 16-fabien barthez ; 19-willy sagnol , 15-lilian thuram , 5-william gallas , 13-mikael silvestre ; 22-franck ribery , 4-patrick vieira , 6-claude makelele , 7-florent malouda ; 20-david trezeguet , 12-thierry henry coach : raymond domenech referee : jorge larrionda -lrb- uruguay -rrb- france coach raymond domenech , missing playmaker zinedine zidane and defender eric abidal through suspension , paired david trezeguet with thierry henry in attack for a game the french must win by two clear goals to make sure of reaching the last 16 of the world cup .
there is no genuine playmaker to replace zidane in a four-man midfield on the right side of which exciting newcomer franck ribery will start a match for france for the second time .
mikael silvestre comes in for abidal at left back while central defender lilian thuram wins his 117th cap , breaking the national record he shared with marcel desailly .
togo coach otto pfister , who had promised to gave all of his players a chance to take the field , made four changes to his starting line-up bringing in jean paul yaovi abalo dosseh , yao aziawanou , moustapha salifou and yao junior senaya , in place of thomas dossevi , kuami agboh , alaixys romao and toure assimiou .
the players are in the tunnel .
the teams take the pitch .
the crowd roars a welcome that quickly changes into peace as the anthems begin .
a long strip of yellow togo fans run along the side of the field but the blue fans of france are in majority under the roof in cologne .
1. min .
the french kick-off .
1. min .
the french will certainly try to get an early goal .
they start off in a good tempo and sagnol gets the first cross .
3. min .
the french are high up .
first chance is trzeguet 's .
the striker gets the ball just inside the box and turns to shoot .
his ball goes a meter wide .
5. min .
the french will have to watch out though .
it is never easy to play a team who has nothing to lose .
6. min .
trzeguet again .
ribery hits in the cross from the left and trezeguet heads it hard .
agassa gets a hand on it and tips it over the bar .
8. min .
a fast counter attack by togo gives barthez in the french goal a first opportunity to show himself .
10. min .
the game is leveling out .
the first minutes of french dominance have given way to a more even game .
11. min .
a long cross from the right ends up only a meter away from barthez who saves the following shot standing on his knees .
13. min .
trezeguet 's goal is offside .
the french striker gets the ball from ribery inside the box and scores before realizing he 's offside .
17. min .
the french have had a couple of good chances to score but so far it 's goalless .
the togolese are dangerous though when they get a chance to counter , something they do at high speed .
19. min .
the togolese have had it fairly easy to break the french attack , which gives the africans possibilities to counter over and over again .
21. min .
trezeguet again .
ribery has started the match well and hits another opener for trezeguet who should have finished better .
the ball is no problem for agassa .
22. min .
silvestre tries agassa with a half volley .
the pressure is there , the chances too but no goal .
25. min .
mamam tries a cross towards the middle but there are no togolese there .
27. min .
salifou comes in from the left and fires a shot that barthez ca n't hold at first .
the french goalie jumps forward to pull the ball back in .
27. min .
ribery brings the ball down the togolese field and gets a great chance to score .
his shot flies high over the goal though .
28. min .
makelele gets booked .
29. min .
mamam 's free-kick outside the french box is too high .
31. min .
a ball from ribery sails in to the box and is headed over the end line by nibombe just before trezeguet gets a chance to put his head on the ball .
35. min .
trezeguet gets a ball to run for but again the french striker is caught offside .
this time it 's very close .
37. min .
aziawonou sees yellow .
38. min .
the french keep coming in strong attacking waves but the togolese have so far always found a way to surf their way out of trouble .
39. min .
henry fires a rocket from thirty meters .
agassa can not hold it .
trezeguet takes the rebound from five meters but the togolese keeper is there again .
40. min .
will the french go into a panic ?
a first false pass by the french is met with whistles .
the french crowd is merciless .
43. min .
mamam gets booked .
the togolese holds on to vieira in the mid circle .
45. min .
the togolese must be happy going into the break with a 0-0 .
45 + 1. min .
a lovely cross from malouda is headed out by nibombe who 's perfectly placed in front of trezeguet and henry both waiting to score .
45 + 1. min .
first half is over .
the french have piled up chances but no goal .
the togolese will have a tough second half but are also pretty cool in defense and make use of their counters , which have given the africans a handful of decent chances .
as it stands , a 0-1 for the french will be enough to see them trough thanks to the swiss leading korea 1-0 .
question is if france will have the mental strength to deliver .
45. min .
second half is on .
45. min .
let 's see if ribery can keep up his good work .
the french midfielder has shown there is life after zidane .
47. min .
ribery wins a free-kick deep on the right outside the box .
47. min .
ribery hits it towards the box line where a waiting trezeguet fires away .
the ball rebounds on a togolese to a corner .
49. min .
adebayor is free with barthez after a lovely chip .
the togolese is wrongly caught offside .
50. min .
kader fights his way towards the french box and gets a shot that flies high .
52. min .
beautiful combination by the french .
henry goes into the box and heels the ball to malouda who drives a cross into the middle where ribery has a great possibility to score but he shoots it up to the stands .
54. min .
goal france ! ! !
vieria .
54. min .
ribery brings the ball in on the left side of the box and passes it along the grass to vieira in the middle who turns and shoots the ball into the right side of the goal .
57. min .
henry gets the next chance as a high cross ball reaches his foot just in front of the togolese goal .
the ball goes wide .
58. min .
mamam goes for olufade .
the togolese bring on a striker for a midfielder .
60. min .
goal !
france !
henry ! ! ! 60. min .
sagnol hits the cross to the box line where vieira heads it on to a free standing henry .
this time nothing can stop him from hitting home his 35th goal for france .
63. min .
the french know they are through with this result but it looks like they will try to score another to be sure .
65. min .
the togolese play much the same way as in first half , waiting for the break to counter attack .
in second half though it has n't resulted in much .
66. min .
sagnol hits a ball along the right wing for ribery who gets the cross in but it goes past all players in the togolese box .
67. min .
vieira finds time for a delicious slide rule pass that reaches trezeguet but agassa is first on the ball .
70. min .
the togolese pay a rare visit to the french box .
the africans have little to play for and it 's understandable that their motivation might not be the strongest .
71. min .
the french are cutting down on the tempo .
73. min .
wiltord goes on for malouda .
an offensive substitution by the french coach suggests he wants more .
74. min .
adebayor leaves for dossevi .
77. min .
ribery leaves the pitch for govou .
ribery can be pleased with his performance .
78. min .
vieira is down after an accidental slap in the face .
the frenchman might be fishing for time a bit as the crowd does the wave .
80. min .
vieira walks off for diarra .
vieira has been the most prolific of the french in the second half .
82. min .
govou wins a free-kick on the right .
the french are not in hurry .
83. min .
another french free-kick sees diarra down for a while before he stands up again .
85. min .
a long ball into the french box forces barthez to make a short rush to be first on the ball .
87. min .
salifou sees yellow .
the togolese is not happy about the decision .
89. min .
togo get a last chance to score but they are a bit too slow inside the box to get a finish on the french goal .
90 + 1. min .
the togolese break in the circle and get yet another chance but no , the finishing touch is not there .
45 + 2. min .
the match is over .
france have won .
the last group stage games of the 2006 world cup have been played and the result is switzerland on top of group g which means they play ukraine , wheras france , group runners up , will have to play spain - which could be one of the more interesting last sixteen games . dw staff -lrb- per -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic 9800 picture gallery daily highlights from the world cup the world cup in pictures a nation expects dw-world.de presents germany 's 2006 world cup squad .
klinsmann springs surprises in naming world cup squad germany world cup squad stadiums check out the 12 venues for the 2006 world cup .
world cup 2006 stadiums from the fringe have a laugh read about quirky happenings in thigh-slappin ' germany in this dw-world.de dossier .

3. min .
the french are high up .
first chance is trzeguet 's .

his ball goes a meter wide .
5. min .
the french will have to watch out though .
it is never easy to play a team who has nothing to lose .
6. min .
trzeguet again .
ribery hits in the cross from the left and trezeguet heads it hard .
agassa gets a hand on it and tips it over the bar .
8. min .
a fast counter attack by togo gives barthez in the french goal a first opportunity to show himself .
10. min .
the game is leveling out .
the first minutes of french dominance have given way to a more even game .
11. min .
a long cross from the right ends up only a meter away from barthez who saves the following shot standing on his knees .
13. min .
trezeguet 's goal is offside .
the french striker gets the ball from ribery inside the box and scores before realizing he 's offside .
17. min .
the french have had a couple of good chances to score but so far it 's goalless .
the togolese are dangerous though when they get a chance to counter , something they do at high speed .
19. min .

trezeguet again .

the ball is no problem for agassa .

the pressure is there , the chances too but no goal .

a ball from ribery sails in to the box and is headed over the end line by nibombe just before trezeguet gets a chance to put his head on the ball .
35. min .
trezeguet gets a ball to run for but again the french striker is caught offside .
this time it 's very close .
37. min .
aziawonou sees yellow .
38. min .
the french keep coming in strong attacking waves but the togolese have so far always found a way to surf their way out of trouble .
39. min .
henry fires a rocket from thirty meters .
agassa can not hold it .
trezeguet takes the rebound from five meters but the togolese keeper is there again .
40. min .
will the french go into a panic ?
a first false pass by the french is met with whistles .
the french crowd is merciless .
43. min .
mamam gets booked .
the togolese holds on to vieira in the mid circle .
45. min .
the togolese must be happy going into the break with a 0-0 .
45 + 1. min .
a lovely cross from malouda is headed out by nibombe who 's perfectly placed in front of trezeguet and henry both waiting to score .
45 + 1. min .
first half is over .
the french have piled up chances but no goal .
the togolese will have a tough second half but are also pretty cool in defense and make use of their counters , which have given the africans a handful of decent chances .
as it stands , a 0-1 for the french will be enough to see them trough thanks to the swiss leading korea 1-0 .
question is if france will have the mental strength to deliver .
45. min .
second half is on .
45. min .
let 's see if ribery can keep up his good work .
the french midfielder has shown there is life after zidane .
47. min .
ribery wins a free-kick deep on the right outside the box .
47. min .
ribery hits it towards the box line where a waiting trezeguet fires away .
the ball rebounds on a togolese to a corner .
49. min .
adebayor is free with barthez after a lovely chip .
the togolese is wrongly caught offside .
50. min .
kader fights his way towards the french box and gets a shot that flies high .
52. min .
beautiful combination by the french .
henry goes into the box and heels the ball to malouda who drives a cross into the middle where ribery has a great possibility to score but he shoots it up to the stands .
54. min .
goal france ! ! !
vieria .
54. min .
ribery brings the ball in on the left side of the box and passes it along the grass to vieira in the middle who turns and shoots the ball into the right side of the goal .
57. min .
henry gets the next chance as a high cross ball reaches his foot just in front of the togolese goal .
the ball goes wide .
58. min .
mamam goes for olufade .
the togolese bring on a striker for a midfielder .
60. min .
goal !
france !
henry ! ! ! 60. min .
sagnol hits the cross to the box line where vieira heads it on to a free standing henry .
this time nothing can stop him from hitting home his 35th goal for france .
63. min .
the french know they are through with this result but it looks like they will try to score another to be sure .
65. min .
the togolese play much the same way as in first half , waiting for the break to counter attack .
in second half though it has n't resulted in much .
66. min .
sagnol hits a ball along the right wing for ribery who gets the cross in but it goes past all players in the togolese box .
67. min .
vieira finds time for a delicious slide rule pass that reaches trezeguet but agassa is first on the ball .
70. min .
the togolese pay a rare visit to the french box .
the africans have little to play for and it 's understandable that their motivation might not be the strongest .
71. min .
the french are cutting down on the tempo .
73. min .
wiltord goes on for malouda .
an offensive substitution by the french coach suggests he wants more .
74. min .
adebayor leaves for dossevi .
77. min .
ribery leaves the pitch for govou .
ribery can be pleased with his performance .
78. min .
vieira is down after an accidental slap in the face .
the frenchman might be fishing for time a bit as the crowd does the wave .
80. min .
vieira walks off for diarra .
vieira has been the most prolific of the french in the second half .
82. min .
govou wins a free-kick on the right .
the french are not in hurry .
83. min .
another french free-kick sees diarra down for a while before he stands up again .
85. min .
a long ball into the french box forces barthez to make a short rush to be first on the ball .
87. min .
salifou sees yellow .
the togolese is not happy about the decision .
89. min .
togo get a last chance to score but they are a bit too slow inside the box to get a finish on the french goal .
90 + 1. min .
the togolese break in the circle and get yet another chance but no , the finishing touch is not there .
45 + 2. min .
the match is over .
france have won .
the last group stage games of the 2006 world cup have been played and the result is switzerland on top of group g which means they play ukraine , wheras france , group runners up , will have to play spain - which could be one of the more interesting last sixteen games . dw staff -lrb- per -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic 9800 picture gallery daily highlights from the world cup the world cup in pictures a nation expects dw-world.de presents germany 's 2006 world cup squad .

live ticker : togo 0:2 france -pipe- match reports -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 23.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese for africa romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 01.04.2011 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?

program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 23.06.2006 live ticker : togo 0:2 france review all the highlights from the game with the dw-world.de live ticker . group g final games dw-world.de will follow already out togo against a france who will have to take their last chance to show they are still a team to count on and not just a set of individual quality .
the french must win to go through while switzerland and south-korea could reach the last sixteen with a draw , although it 's unlikely any of the teams will want to risk playing for such a result .
the line-ups .
togo -lrb- 3-5-2 -rrb- : 16-kossi agassa ; 2-dare nibombe , 3-jean paul yaovi abalo dosseh , 5-massamesso tchangai ; 13-richmond forson , 7-moustapha salifou , 18-yao junior senaya , 10-cherif toure mamam , 6-yao aziawanou ; 4-emmanuel adebayor , 17-mohamed kader coubadja .
coach : otto pfister france -lrb- 4-4-2 -rrb- : 16-fabien barthez ; 19-willy sagnol , 15-lilian thuram , 5-william gallas , 13-mikael silvestre ; 22-franck ribery , 4-patrick vieira , 6-claude makelele , 7-florent malouda ; 20-david trezeguet , 12-thierry henry coach : raymond domenech referee : jorge larrionda -lrb- uruguay -rrb- france coach raymond domenech , missing playmaker zinedine zidane and defender eric abidal through suspension , paired david trezeguet with thierry henry in attack for a game the french must win by two clear goals to make sure of reaching the last 16 of the world cup .
there is no genuine playmaker to replace zidane in a four-man midfield on the right side of which exciting newcomer franck ribery will start a match for france for the second time .
mikael silvestre comes in for abidal at left back while central defender lilian thuram wins his 117th cap , breaking the national record he shared with marcel desailly .
togo coach otto pfister , who had promised to gave all of his players a chance to take the field , made four changes to his starting line-up bringing in jean paul yaovi abalo dosseh , yao aziawanou , moustapha salifou and yao junior senaya , in place of thomas dossevi , kuami agboh , alaixys romao and toure assimiou .
the players are in the tunnel .
the teams take the pitch .
the crowd roars a welcome that quickly changes into peace as the anthems begin .
a long strip of yellow togo fans run along the side of the field but the blue fans of france are in majority under the roof in cologne .
1. min .
the french kick-off .
1. min .
the french will certainly try to get an early goal .
they start off in a good tempo and sagnol gets the first cross .
3. min .
the french are high up .
first chance is trzeguet 's .
the striker gets the ball just inside the box and turns to shoot .
his ball goes a meter wide .
5. min .
the french will have to watch out though .
it is never easy to play a team who has nothing to lose .
6. min .
trzeguet again .
ribery hits in the cross from the left and trezeguet heads it hard .
agassa gets a hand on it and tips it over the bar .
8. min .
a fast counter attack by togo gives barthez in the french goal a first opportunity to show himself .
10. min .
the game is leveling out .
the first minutes of french dominance have given way to a more even game .
11. min .
a long cross from the right ends up only a meter away from barthez who saves the following shot standing on his knees .
13. min .
trezeguet 's goal is offside .
the french striker gets the ball from ribery inside the box and scores before realizing he 's offside .
17. min .
the french have had a couple of good chances to score but so far it 's goalless .
the togolese are dangerous though when they get a chance to counter , something they do at high speed .
19. min .
the togolese have had it fairly easy to break the french attack , which gives the africans possibilities to counter over and over again .
21. min .
trezeguet again .
ribery has started the match well and hits another opener for trezeguet who should have finished better .
the ball is no problem for agassa .
22. min .
silvestre tries agassa with a half volley .
the pressure is there , the chances too but no goal .
25. min .
mamam tries a cross towards the middle but there are no togolese there .
27. min .
salifou comes in from the left and fires a shot that barthez ca n't hold at first .
the french goalie jumps forward to pull the ball back in .
27. min .
ribery brings the ball down the togolese field and gets a great chance to score .
his shot flies high over the goal though .
28. min .
makelele gets booked .
29. min .
mamam 's free-kick outside the french box is too high .
31. min .
a ball from ribery sails in to the box and is headed over the end line by nibombe just before trezeguet gets a chance to put his head on the ball .
35. min .
trezeguet gets a ball to run for but again the french striker is caught offside .
this time it 's very close .
37. min .
aziawonou sees yellow .
38. min .
the french keep coming in strong attacking waves but the togolese have so far always found a way to surf their way out of trouble .
39. min .
henry fires a rocket from thirty meters .
agassa can not hold it .
trezeguet takes the rebound from five meters but the togolese keeper is there again .
40. min .
will the french go into a panic ?
a first false pass by the french is met with whistles .
the french crowd is merciless .
43. min .
mamam gets booked .
the togolese holds on to vieira in the mid circle .
45. min .
the togolese must be happy going into the break with a 0-0 .
45 + 1. min .
a lovely cross from malouda is headed out by nibombe who 's perfectly placed in front of trezeguet and henry both waiting to score .
45 + 1. min .
first half is over .
the french have piled up chances but no goal .
the togolese will have a tough second half but are also pretty cool in defense and make use of their counters , which have given the africans a handful of decent chances .
as it stands , a 0-1 for the french will be enough to see them trough thanks to the swiss leading korea 1-0 .
question is if france will have the mental strength to deliver .
45. min .
second half is on .
45. min .
let 's see if ribery can keep up his good work .
the french midfielder has shown there is life after zidane .
47. min .
ribery wins a free-kick deep on the right outside the box .
47. min .
ribery hits it towards the box line where a waiting trezeguet fires away .
the ball rebounds on a togolese to a corner .
49. min .
adebayor is free with barthez after a lovely chip .
the togolese is wrongly caught offside .
50. min .
kader fights his way towards the french box and gets a shot that flies high .
52. min .
beautiful combination by the french .
henry goes into the box and heels the ball to malouda who drives a cross into the middle where ribery has a great possibility to score but he shoots it up to the stands .
54. min .
goal france ! ! !
vieria .
54. min .
ribery brings the ball in on the left side of the box and passes it along the grass to vieira in the middle who turns and shoots the ball into the right side of the goal .
57. min .
henry gets the next chance as a high cross ball reaches his foot just in front of the togolese goal .
the ball goes wide .
58. min .
mamam goes for olufade .
the togolese bring on a striker for a midfielder .
60. min .
goal !
france !
henry ! ! ! 60. min .
sagnol hits the cross to the box line where vieira heads it on to a free standing henry .
this time nothing can stop him from hitting home his 35th goal for france .
63. min .
the french know they are through with this result but it looks like they will try to score another to be sure .
65. min .
the togolese play much the same way as in first half , waiting for the break to counter attack .
in second half though it has n't resulted in much .
66. min .
sagnol hits a ball along the right wing for ribery who gets the cross in but it goes past all players in the togolese box .
67. min .
vieira finds time for a delicious slide rule pass that reaches trezeguet but agassa is first on the ball .
70. min .
the togolese pay a rare visit to the french box .
the africans have little to play for and it 's understandable that their motivation might not be the strongest .
71. min .
the french are cutting down on the tempo .
73. min .
wiltord goes on for malouda .
an offensive substitution by the french coach suggests he wants more .
74. min .
adebayor leaves for dossevi .
77. min .
ribery leaves the pitch for govou .
ribery can be pleased with his performance .
78. min .
vieira is down after an accidental slap in the face .
the frenchman might be fishing for time a bit as the crowd does the wave .
80. min .
vieira walks off for diarra .
vieira has been the most prolific of the french in the second half .
82. min .
govou wins a free-kick on the right .
the french are not in hurry .
83. min .
another french free-kick sees diarra down for a while before he stands up again .
85. min .
a long ball into the french box forces barthez to make a short rush to be first on the ball .
87. min .
salifou sees yellow .
the togolese is not happy about the decision .
89. min .
togo get a last chance to score but they are a bit too slow inside the box to get a finish on the french goal .
90 + 1. min .
the togolese break in the circle and get yet another chance but no , the finishing touch is not there .
45 + 2. min .
the match is over .
france have won .
the last group stage games of the 2006 world cup have been played and the result is switzerland on top of group g which means they play ukraine , wheras france , group runners up , will have to play spain - which could be one of the more interesting last sixteen games . dw staff -lrb- per -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic feedback send us an e-mail .
please include your name and country in your reply .

82. min .
govou wins a free-kick on the right .
the french are not in hurry .
83. min .
another french free-kick sees diarra down for a while before he stands up again .
85. min .
a long ball into the french box forces barthez to make a short rush to be first on the ball .
87. min .
salifou sees yellow .
the togolese is not happy about the decision .
89. min .
togo get a last chance to score but they are a bit too slow inside the box to get a finish on the french goal .
90 + 1. min .
the togolese break in the circle and get yet another chance but no , the finishing touch is not there .
45 + 2. min .
the match is over .
france have won .
the last group stage games of the 2006 world cup have been played and the result is switzerland on top of group g which means they play ukraine , wheras france , group runners up , will have to play spain - which could be one of the more interesting last sixteen games . dw staff -lrb- per -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic feedback send us an e-mail .
please include your name and country in your reply .

live ticker : togo 0:2 france -pipe- match reports -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 23.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 29.09.2010 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?
programs reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 23.06.2006 live ticker : togo 0:2 france review all the highlights from the game with the dw-world.de live ticker . group g final games dw-world.de will follow already out togo against a france who will have to take their last chance to show they are still a team to count on and not just a set of individual quality .
the french must win to go through while switzerland and south-korea could reach the last sixteen with a draw , although it 's unlikely any of the teams will want to risk playing for such a result .
the line-ups .
togo -lrb- 3-5-2 -rrb- : 16-kossi agassa ; 2-dare nibombe , 3-jean paul yaovi abalo dosseh , 5-massamesso tchangai ; 13-richmond forson , 7-moustapha salifou , 18-yao junior senaya , 10-cherif toure mamam , 6-yao aziawanou ; 4-emmanuel adebayor , 17-mohamed kader coubadja .
coach : otto pfister france -lrb- 4-4-2 -rrb- : 16-fabien barthez ; 19-willy sagnol , 15-lilian thuram , 5-william gallas , 13-mikael silvestre ; 22-franck ribery , 4-patrick vieira , 6-claude makelele , 7-florent malouda ; 20-david trezeguet , 12-thierry henry coach : raymond domenech referee : jorge larrionda -lrb- uruguay -rrb- france coach raymond domenech , missing playmaker zinedine zidane and defender eric abidal through suspension , paired david trezeguet with thierry henry in attack for a game the french must win by two clear goals to make sure of reaching the last 16 of the world cup .
there is no genuine playmaker to replace zidane in a four-man midfield on the right side of which exciting newcomer franck ribery will start a match for france for the second time .
mikael silvestre comes in for abidal at left back while central defender lilian thuram wins his 117th cap , breaking the national record he shared with marcel desailly .
togo coach otto pfister , who had promised to gave all of his players a chance to take the field , made four changes to his starting line-up bringing in jean paul yaovi abalo dosseh , yao aziawanou , moustapha salifou and yao junior senaya , in place of thomas dossevi , kuami agboh , alaixys romao and toure assimiou .
the players are in the tunnel .
the teams take the pitch .
the crowd roars a welcome that quickly changes into peace as the anthems begin .
a long strip of yellow togo fans run along the side of the field but the blue fans of france are in majority under the roof in cologne .
1. min .
the french kick-off .
1. min .
the french will certainly try to get an early goal .
they start off in a good tempo and sagnol gets the first cross .
3. min .
the french are high up .
first chance is trzeguet 's .
the striker gets the ball just inside the box and turns to shoot .
his ball goes a meter wide .
5. min .
the french will have to watch out though .
it is never easy to play a team who has nothing to lose .
6. min .
trzeguet again .
ribery hits in the cross from the left and trezeguet heads it hard .
agassa gets a hand on it and tips it over the bar .
8. min .
a fast counter attack by togo gives barthez in the french goal a first opportunity to show himself .
10. min .
the game is leveling out .
the first minutes of french dominance have given way to a more even game .
11. min .
a long cross from the right ends up only a meter away from barthez who saves the following shot standing on his knees .
13. min .
trezeguet 's goal is offside .
the french striker gets the ball from ribery inside the box and scores before realizing he 's offside .
17. min .
the french have had a couple of good chances to score but so far it 's goalless .
the togolese are dangerous though when they get a chance to counter , something they do at high speed .
19. min .
the togolese have had it fairly easy to break the french attack , which gives the africans possibilities to counter over and over again .
21. min .
trezeguet again .
ribery has started the match well and hits another opener for trezeguet who should have finished better .
the ball is no problem for agassa .
22. min .
silvestre tries agassa with a half volley .
the pressure is there , the chances too but no goal .
25. min .
mamam tries a cross towards the middle but there are no togolese there .
27. min .
salifou comes in from the left and fires a shot that barthez ca n't hold at first .
the french goalie jumps forward to pull the ball back in .
27. min .
ribery brings the ball down the togolese field and gets a great chance to score .
his shot flies high over the goal though .
28. min .
makelele gets booked .
29. min .
mamam 's free-kick outside the french box is too high .
31. min .
a ball from ribery sails in to the box and is headed over the end line by nibombe just before trezeguet gets a chance to put his head on the ball .
35. min .
trezeguet gets a ball to run for but again the french striker is caught offside .
this time it 's very close .
37. min .
aziawonou sees yellow .
38. min .
the french keep coming in strong attacking waves but the togolese have so far always found a way to surf their way out of trouble .
39. min .
henry fires a rocket from thirty meters .
agassa can not hold it .
trezeguet takes the rebound from five meters but the togolese keeper is there again .
40. min .
will the french go into a panic ?
a first false pass by the french is met with whistles .
the french crowd is merciless .
43. min .
mamam gets booked .
the togolese holds on to vieira in the mid circle .
45. min .
the togolese must be happy going into the break with a 0-0 .
45 + 1. min .
a lovely cross from malouda is headed out by nibombe who 's perfectly placed in front of trezeguet and henry both waiting to score .
45 + 1. min .
first half is over .
the french have piled up chances but no goal .
the togolese will have a tough second half but are also pretty cool in defense and make use of their counters , which have given the africans a handful of decent chances .
as it stands , a 0-1 for the french will be enough to see them trough thanks to the swiss leading korea 1-0 .
question is if france will have the mental strength to deliver .
45. min .
second half is on .
45. min .
let 's see if ribery can keep up his good work .
the french midfielder has shown there is life after zidane .
47. min .
ribery wins a free-kick deep on the right outside the box .
47. min .
ribery hits it towards the box line where a waiting trezeguet fires away .
the ball rebounds on a togolese to a corner .
49. min .
adebayor is free with barthez after a lovely chip .
the togolese is wrongly caught offside .
50. min .
kader fights his way towards the french box and gets a shot that flies high .
52. min .
beautiful combination by the french .
henry goes into the box and heels the ball to malouda who drives a cross into the middle where ribery has a great possibility to score but he shoots it up to the stands .
54. min .
goal france ! ! !
vieria .
54. min .
ribery brings the ball in on the left side of the box and passes it along the grass to vieira in the middle who turns and shoots the ball into the right side of the goal .
57. min .
henry gets the next chance as a high cross ball reaches his foot just in front of the togolese goal .
the ball goes wide .
58. min .
mamam goes for olufade .
the togolese bring on a striker for a midfielder .
60. min .
goal !
france !
henry ! ! ! 60. min .
sagnol hits the cross to the box line where vieira heads it on to a free standing henry .
this time nothing can stop him from hitting home his 35th goal for france .
63. min .
the french know they are through with this result but it looks like they will try to score another to be sure .
65. min .
the togolese play much the same way as in first half , waiting for the break to counter attack .
in second half though it has n't resulted in much .
66. min .
sagnol hits a ball along the right wing for ribery who gets the cross in but it goes past all players in the togolese box .
67. min .
vieira finds time for a delicious slide rule pass that reaches trezeguet but agassa is first on the ball .
70. min .
the togolese pay a rare visit to the french box .
the africans have little to play for and it 's understandable that their motivation might not be the strongest .
71. min .
the french are cutting down on the tempo .
73. min .
wiltord goes on for malouda .
an offensive substitution by the french coach suggests he wants more .
74. min .
adebayor leaves for dossevi .
77. min .
ribery leaves the pitch for govou .
ribery can be pleased with his performance .
78. min .
vieira is down after an accidental slap in the face .
the frenchman might be fishing for time a bit as the crowd does the wave .
80. min .
vieira walks off for diarra .
vieira has been the most prolific of the french in the second half .
82. min .
govou wins a free-kick on the right .
the french are not in hurry .
83. min .
another french free-kick sees diarra down for a while before he stands up again .
85. min .
a long ball into the french box forces barthez to make a short rush to be first on the ball .
87. min .
salifou sees yellow .
the togolese is not happy about the decision .
89. min .
togo get a last chance to score but they are a bit too slow inside the box to get a finish on the french goal .
90 + 1. min .
the togolese break in the circle and get yet another chance but no , the finishing touch is not there .
45 + 2. min .
the match is over .
france have won .
the last group stage games of the 2006 world cup have been played and the result is switzerland on top of group g which means they play ukraine , wheras france , group runners up , will have to play spain - which could be one of the more interesting last sixteen games . dw staff -lrb- per -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic feedback send us an e-mail .
please include your name and country in your reply .

opinion : bush 's freedom speech fell flat -pipe- europe -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 23.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 01.11.2010 home news germany europe map world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?
programs reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de europe -pipe- 23.06.2006 opinion : bush 's freedom speech fell flat großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : bush delivered his speech on budapest 's gellert hill with his speech in budapest on thursday , us president george w. bush attempted to latch onto an american tradition of great orations on freedom , but it did n't quite work out that way , says dw 's miodrag soric . john f. kennedy , jimmy carter , ronald reagan : all of these american presidents delivered speeches in europe on the topic of freedom .
above all , they called on the soviet dictators to give freedom back to the nations of eastern europe .
the support of the free world was guaranteed , as was resounding applause back home .
on thursday , president bush attempted to follow this tradition with a speech in budapest , but he did n't quite succeed .
the most important difference since the era of reagan and his predecessors : the soviet union .
the country once dubbed the " evil empire " no longer exists .
even if critics still rightly point to the kremlin 's human rights violations , the fact is that even russia is on the path towards becoming a democracy . shaky comparison the other point is that calls for freedom are much more effective when the speaker draws on the present-day situation .
president bush , however , drew on hungary 's unsuccessful 1956 revolt against communism .
he tried to segue to the here and now with a comment on iraq , the message being : just as hungarians fought for freedom in 1956 , so iraqis do today . but this comparison , as with so many historical comparisons , flopped .
it does n't even bear thinking about what would happen if the iraqis really were in a position to decide whether american troops were welcome in their country or not . in the arab world , many compare the soviet occupation of afghanistan in 1979 with the deployment of american troops in iraq today .
bush would , rightly so , reject such parallels .
without the presence of us troops , iraq would likely slide into a state of civil war .
and even though this is the case , bush was still unable to portray us troops as liberators in his speech . lacking credibility bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : amnesty international activists dressed as guantanamo detainees for their protest in budapest this is mainly due to the policies of the united states and its highest officials .
those who - like bush - lay claim to a leading role in the fight for freedom and respect for human rights should at least be credible .
the americans simply do n't have the kind of credibility they did back in 1956 . in recent times , american soldiers have too often been guilty of human rights violations , killing and torturing civilians .
you ca n't claim to respect human rights and defend a camp like guantanamo in the same breath .
september 11 , 2001 can not eternally be used as an excuse as to why international laws should apply to all nations except the usa . if anyone in budapest deserves to be praised , then it 's hungarian president laszlo solyom , whose message to bush was that the fight against international terrorism can only succeed if , at every step , the rules of international justice are obeyed and human rights are respected . miodrag soric -lrb- dc -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de bush to eu : we 're working on closing guantanamo us president george w. bush and eu leaders wednesday sent a warning to iran and north korea on their nuclear plans but avoided a public squabble over eu concerns at human rights abuses in guantanamo bay prison camp .
-lrb- june 21 , 2006 -rrb- us expected to pledge to respect human rights at summit us president george w. bush meets with the 25-nation european union wednesday in a summit expected to show that the two sides closing ranks over respecting human rights while fighting terrorism .
-lrb- june 21 , 2006 -rrb- eu , us present united front ahead of vienna summit vienna is gearing up to host the next eu-us summit on wednesday .
while the relationship between the two powers is often described as " complex , " this time , it seems there is consensus on the main issues up for discussion .
-lrb- june 20 , 2006 -rrb- feedback how do you think bush performed in budapest ?
send us an e-mail .
please include your name and country in your reply .

live ticker : ukraine 1:0 tunisia -pipe- match reports -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 23.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 30.11.2010 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?
programs reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 23.06.2006 live ticker : ukraine 1:0 tunisia review all the game highlights with the dw-world.de live ticker . welcome to the dw-world.de live ticker .
the group h clash will decide who joins likely group winners spain in the knockout stage .
tunisia need a win to make virtually certain they claim the second spot while ukraine are likely to require only a draw .
dw-world.de will give you all the action from the game between ukraine , world cup debutants , and tunisia , looking for their first win in a world cup game since 1978 .
we will also give you highlights from the other group h game between saudi-arabia and spain .
the line-ups .
ukraine -lrb- 3-5-2 -rrb- : 1-oleksander shovkovsky ; 6-andriy rusol , 22-vyacheslav svidersky , 2-andriy nesmachny ; 9-oleg gusev , 4-anatoly tymoshchyuk , 8-oleg shelayev , 19-maxim kalinichenko , 11-serhiy rebrov ; 7-andriy shevchenko , 10-andriy voronin coach : oleg blokhin tunisia -lrb- 4-5-1 -rrb- : 1-ali boumnijel ; 6-hatem trabelsi , 15-radhi jaidi , 3-karim hagui , 19-anis ayari ; 20-hamed namouchi , 12-joahar mnari , 14-adel chedli , 8-medhi nafti , 13-riadh bouazizi ; 5-ziad jaziri coach : roger lemerre referee : carlos amarilla -lrb- paraguay -rrb- about ten minutes to kick-off .
tunisia again have to start without their injured striker dos santos .
the players are entering the pitch .
the blue and yellow fans of ukraine are dancing and singing .
they are in majority but part of the stadium is red and waving the tunisian flag .
the anthems have been played .
the players shake hands .
1. min .
tunisia kick off .
1. min .
a long ball down to shevchenko on the right is the first attempt in the game .
2. min .
what a chance for ukraine .
jaidi screws up outside the box for voronin to steal the ball .
the ukraine comes two against one but voronin 's pass is sloppy .
4. min .
a free-kick from kalininchenko from the left goes well over goal .
5. min .
nafti almost finds jaziri running into the box .
7. min .
ukraine have managed to get a small grip on the events but both teams have started rather carefully and mistakes are not few on either side .
8. min .
jaziri gets booked for falling lightly in the box .
9. min .
the tunisians are trying to go through on the right with trabelsi , who has managed to go around the ukraine defense a couple of times to deliver the cross .
11. min .
the teams are in no hurry .
ukraine are playing a lot of long balls from the defense but they have n't caused the tunisians any real problems yet .
13. min .
trabelsi again .
the tunisian gets the ball down at the right flag and dribbles his way into the box where he loses the ball .
13. min .
jaidi gets a shot but it flies high over shovkovsky 's goal .
15. min .
a wall pass opens up the tunisian defense and creates some confusion that leads to a free-kick for the ukrainians .
shevchenko hits it far though .
17. min .
svidersky sees yellow .
18. min .
the tunisian free-kick is hit on goal but the ukrainian keeper is well positioned and has no problems .
20. min .
if one of the teams decided to raise the tempo they would probably give the opponents such a shock they would n't understand what happened .
21. min .
at last some action .
the ukrainians suddenly do push the tempo and the result is the best chance so far .
tymoshchyuk gets a good shot on goal from within the box .
boumnijel in the tunisian goal has to prove himself .
24. min .
in the last three minutes the ukrainians have started combinig and have found their way into the box on several occasions .
nothing really dangerous so far though .
27. min .
we 're still not at light speed but the game is slightly more thrilling at the moment .
28. min .
the crowd finding ways of entertainment .
the wave performed in the stands is louder and more exciting than the game obviously .
30. min .
a corner for the tunisians .
nothing else to report .
come on now teams ! 31. min .
shevchenko through .
a well balanced chip finds the ukrainian striker 's foot on the box line .
it looks as he is past his two defenders but somehow loses the ball before having a chance to finish .
33. min .
tunisians combine nicely .
no result though .
not even a shot .
35. min .
an ukrainian free-kick lands on the goal roof .
37. min .
the ukrainians are walking the thinner line .
if tunisia were to score it could prove fatal as it might be hard to switch pace later .
38. min .
jaidi seem to have hurt himself suddenly .
the tunisian defender limps to the sideline 39. min .
trabelsi gets a good cross in from the right and it lands in front of goal between two ukrainians and jaziri who ca n't reach it .
trabelsi has been the one tunisian player who stands out a bit .
42. min .
some booing and whistling reach the pitch .
42. min .
bouazizi booked .
44. min .
shevchenko fiddles about with the ball in the box .
has someone put sleeping pills in the water bottles around the pitch ? 45 + 1. min .
jaziri leaves the pitch after an attack on shelayev .
45 + 1. min .
first half ends .
shelayev rockets a shot from twenty five meters just before the sending off of jaziri .
the shot is the last -lrb- and almost only -rrb- real attempt on goal in this boring first half .
the players are back on the pitch .
let 's hope it 's a better second half .
45. min .
second half gets underway with ukraine kicking off .
46. min .
shelayev booked for bringing down trabelsi .
48. min .
no signs of a speedier more exhilarating game in the first few minutes .
the teams are still impersonating the living dead .
50. min .
more long balls from the ukrainians .
this one reaches voronin on the right but he has no time before the tunisian defense is all around him .
52. min .
more unhappy whistling from the stands .
the ukrainian fans are wondering why no one is in the tunisian box when the cross comes flying in .
54. min .
rebrov leaves for vorobey .
56. min .
trying to be optimistic , you could say that both defenses are tight , but in all honesty they have not had much serious threat to fight off .
58. min .
the ukrainians have positioned themselves higher up the field to try to gain early control and it seems to be working .
ukraine have more possession but are still extremely sloppy .
60. min .
tymoshchyuk booked .
62. min .
you might want to ask the ukrainians why , with one man more on the pitch , they do n't try to secure their place in the last sixteen .
63. min .
an ukrainian cross from the right almost reaches the two strikers in the box .
63. min .
rusol sees yellow .
free-kick for tunisia just outside the box .
64. min .
ayari hits a nice free-kick .
the tunisian gets the ball over the wall and it dives down nicely but lands in the net just over the crossbar .
66. min .
in fact ayari 's free-kick deflects off an ukrainian arm .
that could have ended with a penalty .
69. min .
penalty for ukraine ! ! 69. min .
shevchenko hits the penalty home .
the striker was the one who passed the tunisian goalie in the box and who was brought down by hagui .
now his kick could take ukraine to the last sixteen .
72. min .
could this be a wake-up call for the tunisian team who had just started to build up some pace after ayari 's free-kick earlier ? 74. min .
kalinichenko goes out for gusin .
76. min .
the game keeps rolling like it has most of the time .
much like a steam train .
79. min .
dos santos goes on for chedli and ben saada for bouazizi in a double bill .
81. min .
can the tunisian star striker , who so unfortunately have n't been able to play so far in the world cup , change things ? 83. min .
it does n't look like tunisia have anything up the sleeve .
and as the cameras focus on a nearly sleeping fifa boss , it is clear that even the extremist soccer fans have trouble getting enthusiastic about this game .
85. min .
trabelsi gets a chance .
the tunisian captain , the only player in his team to show some talent today , fires off a shot from the right side of the box .
it goes wide .
86. min .
shevchenko leaves for milevsky .
88. min .
voronin gets a chance to score .
the ukrainian striker wall passes his way in and gets a decent shot on the way but boumnijel saves .
89. min .
jaidi sees yellow .
90. min .
nafti goes for ghodbane .
90 + 1. min .
dos santos .
that 's close .
a free-kick lands in the box where players have fallen on the pitch .
the ball then reaches dos santos who heads it just to the left .
90 + 3. min .
game over .
voronin gets a last chance from within the box as he receives a cross , turns and shoots about a meter wide .
that was the end of the perhaps least interesting game of the world cup so far .
it means the ukraine are through together with spain who beat saudi arabia to finalize group h. dw staff -lrb- per -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic feedback send us an e-mail .
please include your name and country in your reply .

a sleeping pill of a game sees ukraine stumble forward -pipe- match reports -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 23.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 01.11.2010 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?
programs reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 23.06.2006 a sleeping pill of a game sees ukraine stumble forward großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : ukraine celebrate their trip to world cup 's the round of 16 the ukrainian and tunisian fans who came to berlin hoping to see their team advance were given a poor show as ukraine , with the help of a penalty , managed an uneventful 1-0 victory to see them through to the last 16 . the ukraine were seen as favorites to win this game , and so they did , but not without some luck . anis ayari hit a free-kick in the 64th minute for tunisia that was deflected just over the crossbar by a ukrainian hand in the wall .
that could have been a penalty for the tunisians at a crucial moment in a still goalless match . total lack of creativity the game played in front of a predominantly neutral crowd but with sections of ukrainian blue and yellow joined by flecks of tunisian red , never took off .
in the second minute andriy voronin stole the ball to build up a two-against-one but as he passed the ball sloppily , and it never reached its address bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : ukranian fans did n't have much to watch in the thrid group match the rest of the game continued in similar fashion .
few chances were created .
in fact the word " create " can not really be used to describe the match that was mainly a display of long balls , mistakes and a lot of ping pong at midfield . hatem trabelsi , the tunisian skipper , tried in the first twenty minutes to make a difference .
with good pace , a rarity in this game , he went through a couple of times on the right wing to deliver his crosses , but they never posed any serious threat to shovkovsky in the ukraine goal . between the 21st and the 27th minute the ukrainians raised the tempo in a six-minute stint that featured actual combinations that put pressure on the tunisian defense .
what ended this offensive push so quickly remains a mystery . why they did n't come back after the break with the urge to win is an even bigger one , as they were a man up after tunisia 's only striker , ziad jaziri , was given the red card on stoppage time in first half . penalty and no penalty needed to decide the match bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : a penalty kick was the only goal of a game both teams needed to win the second half provided more of the same , although it 's likely the ukrainians were told to stand higher up in the field , something that swung the game slightly in favor of the world cup newcomers .
their side had more possession but did little to open up the scoring . instead it was tunisia who got a good chance in the 64th minute with a free-kick only a couple of meters outside the ukrainian penalty box .
ayari struck it well , but the replay showed it was deflected by voronin 's hand , and the ukrainians must be relieved it did n't result in a penalty kick for tunisia . five minutes later shevchenko trickled passed his defenders to come clean with boumnijel in the tunisian goal .
the keeper made himself big and followed shevchenko 's move well , something that karim hagui should have considered before bringing down the ukrainian striker who rather easily got his penalty .
the ac milan star went up to the spot and placed the ball behind boumnijel without much effort . even down a goal , the expected tunisian onslaught for an equalizer never materialized .
not even the entrance of brazilian born star striker dos santos with 11 minutes left could ratchet up the pace . spain beat saudi-arabia to win group h in the other group h game , a spanish team with much of their first string resting on the bench beat saudi-arabia in kaiserslautern to defend their top slot in the group . spain and ukraine 's next opponents will be decided in friday 's final set of group round matches .
they could face switzerland , south korea or france . dw staff -lrb- per -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de sheva views crucial tunisia match ; torres sits out saudi game andriy shevchenko has got his groove back just in time as ukraine need a win friday against tunisia to reach the last 16 .
qualified spain are so relaxed that fernando torres and others will sit out the saudi arabia game .
-lrb- june 23 , 2006 -rrb- ukraine hit their own four goal fest as saudi arabia crash out on the wrong end of a 4-0 thrashing in their debut game , ukraine wanted saudi arabia to know exactly how that felt and meted out a four goal rout of their own which could have been many , many more in hamburg .
-lrb- june 19 , 2006 -rrb- live ticker : ukraine 1:0 tunisia review all the game 's details with the dw-world.de live ticker .
feedback what did you think of the games ?
send us an e-mail .
please include your name and country in your reply .

program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 23.06.2006 a sleeping pill of a game sees ukraine stumble forward großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : ukraine celebrate their trip to world cup 's the round of 16 the ukrainian and tunisian fans who came to berlin hoping to see their team advance were given a poor show as ukraine , with the help of a penalty , managed an uneventful 1-0 victory to see them through to the last 16 . the ukraine were seen as favorites to win this game , and so they did , but not without some luck . anis ayari hit a free-kick in the 64th minute for tunisia that was deflected just over the crossbar by a ukrainian hand in the wall .
that could have been a penalty for the tunisians at a crucial moment in a still goalless match . total lack of creativity the game played in front of a predominantly neutral crowd but with sections of ukrainian blue and yellow joined by flecks of tunisian red , never took off .
in the second minute andriy voronin stole the ball to build up a two-against-one but as he passed the ball sloppily , and it never reached its address bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : ukranian fans did n't have much to watch in the thrid group match the rest of the game continued in similar fashion .
few chances were created .
in fact the word " create " can not really be used to describe the match that was mainly a display of long balls , mistakes and a lot of ping pong at midfield . hatem trabelsi , the tunisian skipper , tried in the first twenty minutes to make a difference .
with good pace , a rarity in this game , he went through a couple of times on the right wing to deliver his crosses , but they never posed any serious threat to shovkovsky in the ukraine goal . between the 21st and the 27th minute the ukrainians raised the tempo in a six-minute stint that featured actual combinations that put pressure on the tunisian defense .
what ended this offensive push so quickly remains a mystery . why they did n't come back after the break with the urge to win is an even bigger one , as they were a man up after tunisia 's only striker , ziad jaziri , was given the red card on stoppage time in first half . penalty and no penalty needed to decide the match bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : a penalty kick was the only goal of a game both teams needed to win the second half provided more of the same , although it 's likely the ukrainians were told to stand higher up in the field , something that swung the game slightly in favor of the world cup newcomers .
their side had more possession but did little to open up the scoring . instead it was tunisia who got a good chance in the 64th minute with a free-kick only a couple of meters outside the ukrainian penalty box .
ayari struck it well , but the replay showed it was deflected by voronin 's hand , and the ukrainians must be relieved it did n't result in a penalty kick for tunisia . five minutes later shevchenko trickled passed his defenders to come clean with boumnijel in the tunisian goal .
the keeper made himself big and followed shevchenko 's move well , something that karim hagui should have considered before bringing down the ukrainian striker who rather easily got his penalty .
the ac milan star went up to the spot and placed the ball behind boumnijel without much effort . even down a goal , the expected tunisian onslaught for an equalizer never materialized .
not even the entrance of brazilian born star striker dos santos with 11 minutes left could ratchet up the pace . spain beat saudi-arabia to win group h in the other group h game , a spanish team with much of their first string resting on the bench beat saudi-arabia in kaiserslautern to defend their top slot in the group . spain and ukraine 's next opponents will be decided in friday 's final set of group round matches .
they could face switzerland , south korea or france . dw staff -lrb- per -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de sheva views crucial tunisia match ; torres sits out saudi game andriy shevchenko has got his groove back just in time as ukraine need a win friday against tunisia to reach the last 16 .
qualified spain are so relaxed that fernando torres and others will sit out the saudi arabia game .

a sleeping pill of a game sees ukraine stumble forward -pipe- match reports -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 23.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese for africa romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 03.04.2011 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?
reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 23.06.2006 a sleeping pill of a game sees ukraine stumble forward großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : ukraine celebrate their trip to world cup 's the round of 16 the ukrainian and tunisian fans who came to berlin hoping to see their team advance were given a poor show as ukraine , with the help of a penalty , managed an uneventful 1-0 victory to see them through to the last 16 . the ukraine were seen as favorites to win this game , and so they did , but not without some luck . anis ayari hit a free-kick in the 64th minute for tunisia that was deflected just over the crossbar by a ukrainian hand in the wall .
that could have been a penalty for the tunisians at a crucial moment in a still goalless match . total lack of creativity the game played in front of a predominantly neutral crowd but with sections of ukrainian blue and yellow joined by flecks of tunisian red , never took off .
in the second minute andriy voronin stole the ball to build up a two-against-one but as he passed the ball sloppily , and it never reached its address bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : ukranian fans did n't have much to watch in the thrid group match the rest of the game continued in similar fashion .
few chances were created .
in fact the word " create " can not really be used to describe the match that was mainly a display of long balls , mistakes and a lot of ping pong at midfield . hatem trabelsi , the tunisian skipper , tried in the first twenty minutes to make a difference .
with good pace , a rarity in this game , he went through a couple of times on the right wing to deliver his crosses , but they never posed any serious threat to shovkovsky in the ukraine goal . between the 21st and the 27th minute the ukrainians raised the tempo in a six-minute stint that featured actual combinations that put pressure on the tunisian defense .
what ended this offensive push so quickly remains a mystery . why they did n't come back after the break with the urge to win is an even bigger one , as they were a man up after tunisia 's only striker , ziad jaziri , was given the red card on stoppage time in first half . penalty and no penalty needed to decide the match bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : a penalty kick was the only goal of a game both teams needed to win the second half provided more of the same , although it 's likely the ukrainians were told to stand higher up in the field , something that swung the game slightly in favor of the world cup newcomers .
their side had more possession but did little to open up the scoring . instead it was tunisia who got a good chance in the 64th minute with a free-kick only a couple of meters outside the ukrainian penalty box .
ayari struck it well , but the replay showed it was deflected by voronin 's hand , and the ukrainians must be relieved it did n't result in a penalty kick for tunisia . five minutes later shevchenko trickled passed his defenders to come clean with boumnijel in the tunisian goal .
the keeper made himself big and followed shevchenko 's move well , something that karim hagui should have considered before bringing down the ukrainian striker who rather easily got his penalty .
the ac milan star went up to the spot and placed the ball behind boumnijel without much effort . even down a goal , the expected tunisian onslaught for an equalizer never materialized .
not even the entrance of brazilian born star striker dos santos with 11 minutes left could ratchet up the pace . spain beat saudi-arabia to win group h in the other group h game , a spanish team with much of their first string resting on the bench beat saudi-arabia in kaiserslautern to defend their top slot in the group . spain and ukraine 's next opponents will be decided in friday 's final set of group round matches .
they could face switzerland , south korea or france . dw staff -lrb- per -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de sheva views crucial tunisia match ; torres sits out saudi game andriy shevchenko has got his groove back just in time as ukraine need a win friday against tunisia to reach the last 16 .
qualified spain are so relaxed that fernando torres and others will sit out the saudi arabia game .
-lrb- june 23 , 2006 -rrb- ukraine hit their own four goal fest as saudi arabia crash out on the wrong end of a 4-0 thrashing in their debut game , ukraine wanted saudi arabia to know exactly how that felt and meted out a four goal rout of their own which could have been many , many more in hamburg .
-lrb- june 19 , 2006 -rrb- live ticker : ukraine 1:0 tunisia review all the game 's details with the dw-world.de live ticker .
feedback what did you think of the games ?
send us an e-mail .
please include your name and country in your reply .
