german authorities deny knowledge of el-masri interrogator -pipe- germany -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 23.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 06.11.2010 home news germany german reunification europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?
programs reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de germany -pipe- 23.06.2006 german authorities deny knowledge of el-masri interrogator großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : khaled el-masri stands by his story a parliamentary committee looking into the role of german intelligence during the iraq war was told there was no proof of collusion by german authorities in the abduction of a man who says he was kidnapped by the cia . khaled el-masri , the lebanese-born man at the center of the probe , gave the panel his account of what happened to him nearly three years ago .
a naturalized german citizen , he insisted he was interrogated by a german agent . " based on the way he looked and his accent , he was definitely german , " he said .
he explained that the man he knew as " sam " made his first appearance in the kabul prison where el-masri was being held in may 2004 , and that his treatment improved immediately . el-masri said he had recognized " sam " in photographs of an official with the federal criminal police office -lrb- bka -rrb- . nonetheless , according to martin hofmann , one of the state prosecutors investigating the case , " there is no evidence to suggest that el-masri 's account of his abduction is not accurate . " but both german intelligence and the bka have denied that " sam " works for either body and said they could prove that the man identified by el-masri was in germany at the time of his abduction . does germany sanction torture ? while one burning question at thursday 's hearing was the identity of " sam , " another was the extent of german authorities ' involvement in the case . wolfgang neskovic , the left party 's member of the oversight committee , said that the basic principle at stake was whether germany was willing to sanction torture as a tool in the war on terror . so far , the committee 's findings have been neutral . " there 's still no proof that german authorities were involved in the incident , " said thomas opermann from the investigation committee . injustice bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : el-masri broke down during the hearing but el-masri 's attorney has argued otherwise . " if it turns out that german authorities were involved , then it would n't be up to us to demand action .
what happened was a huge injustice , " said his lawyer , manfred gnjidic . el-masri says he was kidnapped while in macedonia in late 2003 and then transferred to a cia-run prison in afghanistan where he was held for four months .
after his release he says he was dumped in albania . recalling his ordeal , el-masri struggled to contain himself and asked for a break in questioning . opposition mps are outraged by his account . " he was kidnapped , and interrogated under horrible conditions in afghanistan after being questioned in macedonia , " said hans-christian ströbele from the green party . the inquiry is scheduled to meet again next thursday to continue looking into el-masri 's allegations . dw staff -lrb- jp -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de german testifies in probe into alleged cia abduction a parliamentary probe hears testimony from a german citizen , khaled al-masri , who alleged he was kidnapped by the cia and held for five months in an afghan jail .
german authorities have denied a role in the affair .
-lrb- june 22 , 2006 -rrb- german intelligence agency admits knowledge of cia abduction following a disclosure that the german intelligence spied on german journalists , the agency is admitting another embarrassing mistake - that it knew of the abduction of a german national almost two years ago .
-lrb- june 1 , 2006 -rrb- commission scrutinizes german intelligence 's role in iraq a german parliamentary commission is meeting wednesday behind closed doors to examine the role of the country 's secret service in the iraq war .
-lrb- feb .
22 , 2006 -rrb- audios and videos on the topic el masri appears before the investigation committee feedback do you find el-masri 's evidence credible ?
send us an e-mail , and please include your name and country in your reply .

" there 's still no proof that german authorities were involved in the incident , " said thomas opermann from the investigation committee . injustice bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : el-masri broke down during the hearing but el-masri 's attorney has argued otherwise . " if it turns out that german authorities were involved , then it would n't be up to us to demand action .
what happened was a huge injustice , " said his lawyer , manfred gnjidic . el-masri says he was kidnapped while in macedonia in late 2003 and then transferred to a cia-run prison in afghanistan where he was held for four months .
after his release he says he was dumped in albania . recalling his ordeal , el-masri struggled to contain himself and asked for a break in questioning . opposition mps are outraged by his account . " he was kidnapped , and interrogated under horrible conditions in afghanistan after being questioned in macedonia , " said hans-christian ströbele from the green party . the inquiry is scheduled to meet again next thursday to continue looking into el-masri 's allegations . dw staff -lrb- jp -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de german testifies in probe into alleged cia abduction a parliamentary probe hears testimony from a german citizen , khaled al-masri , who alleged he was kidnapped by the cia and held for five months in an afghan jail .
german authorities have denied a role in the affair .

a sleeping pill of a game sees ukraine stumble forward -pipe- match reports -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 23.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 06.11.2010 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?
programs reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 23.06.2006 a sleeping pill of a game sees ukraine stumble forward großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : ukraine celebrate their trip to world cup 's the round of 16 the ukrainian and tunisian fans who came to berlin hoping to see their team advance were given a poor show as ukraine , with the help of a penalty , managed an uneventful 1-0 victory to see them through to the last 16 . the ukraine were seen as favorites to win this game , and so they did , but not without some luck . anis ayari hit a free-kick in the 64th minute for tunisia that was deflected just over the crossbar by a ukrainian hand in the wall .
that could have been a penalty for the tunisians at a crucial moment in a still goalless match . total lack of creativity the game played in front of a predominantly neutral crowd but with sections of ukrainian blue and yellow joined by flecks of tunisian red , never took off .
in the second minute andriy voronin stole the ball to build up a two-against-one but as he passed the ball sloppily , and it never reached its address bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : ukranian fans did n't have much to watch in the thrid group match the rest of the game continued in similar fashion .
few chances were created .
in fact the word " create " can not really be used to describe the match that was mainly a display of long balls , mistakes and a lot of ping pong at midfield . hatem trabelsi , the tunisian skipper , tried in the first twenty minutes to make a difference .
with good pace , a rarity in this game , he went through a couple of times on the right wing to deliver his crosses , but they never posed any serious threat to shovkovsky in the ukraine goal . between the 21st and the 27th minute the ukrainians raised the tempo in a six-minute stint that featured actual combinations that put pressure on the tunisian defense .
what ended this offensive push so quickly remains a mystery . why they did n't come back after the break with the urge to win is an even bigger one , as they were a man up after tunisia 's only striker , ziad jaziri , was given the red card on stoppage time in first half . penalty and no penalty needed to decide the match bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : a penalty kick was the only goal of a game both teams needed to win the second half provided more of the same , although it 's likely the ukrainians were told to stand higher up in the field , something that swung the game slightly in favor of the world cup newcomers .
their side had more possession but did little to open up the scoring . instead it was tunisia who got a good chance in the 64th minute with a free-kick only a couple of meters outside the ukrainian penalty box .
ayari struck it well , but the replay showed it was deflected by voronin 's hand , and the ukrainians must be relieved it did n't result in a penalty kick for tunisia . five minutes later shevchenko trickled passed his defenders to come clean with boumnijel in the tunisian goal .
the keeper made himself big and followed shevchenko 's move well , something that karim hagui should have considered before bringing down the ukrainian striker who rather easily got his penalty .
the ac milan star went up to the spot and placed the ball behind boumnijel without much effort . even down a goal , the expected tunisian onslaught for an equalizer never materialized .
not even the entrance of brazilian born star striker dos santos with 11 minutes left could ratchet up the pace . spain beat saudi-arabia to win group h in the other group h game , a spanish team with much of their first string resting on the bench beat saudi-arabia in kaiserslautern to defend their top slot in the group . spain and ukraine 's next opponents will be decided in friday 's final set of group round matches .
they could face switzerland , south korea or france . dw staff -lrb- per -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de sheva views crucial tunisia match ; torres sits out saudi game andriy shevchenko has got his groove back just in time as ukraine need a win friday against tunisia to reach the last 16 .
qualified spain are so relaxed that fernando torres and others will sit out the saudi arabia game .
-lrb- june 23 , 2006 -rrb- ukraine hit their own four goal fest as saudi arabia crash out on the wrong end of a 4-0 thrashing in their debut game , ukraine wanted saudi arabia to know exactly how that felt and meted out a four goal rout of their own which could have been many , many more in hamburg .
-lrb- june 19 , 2006 -rrb- live ticker : ukraine 1:0 tunisia review all the game 's details with the dw-world.de live ticker .
feedback what did you think of the games ?
send us an e-mail .
please include your name and country in your reply .

program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 23.06.2006 a sleeping pill of a game sees ukraine stumble forward großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : ukraine celebrate their trip to world cup 's the round of 16 the ukrainian and tunisian fans who came to berlin hoping to see their team advance were given a poor show as ukraine , with the help of a penalty , managed an uneventful 1-0 victory to see them through to the last 16 . the ukraine were seen as favorites to win this game , and so they did , but not without some luck . anis ayari hit a free-kick in the 64th minute for tunisia that was deflected just over the crossbar by a ukrainian hand in the wall .
that could have been a penalty for the tunisians at a crucial moment in a still goalless match . total lack of creativity the game played in front of a predominantly neutral crowd but with sections of ukrainian blue and yellow joined by flecks of tunisian red , never took off .
in the second minute andriy voronin stole the ball to build up a two-against-one but as he passed the ball sloppily , and it never reached its address bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : ukranian fans did n't have much to watch in the thrid group match the rest of the game continued in similar fashion .
few chances were created .
in fact the word " create " can not really be used to describe the match that was mainly a display of long balls , mistakes and a lot of ping pong at midfield . hatem trabelsi , the tunisian skipper , tried in the first twenty minutes to make a difference .

ayari struck it well , but the replay showed it was deflected by voronin 's hand , and the ukrainians must be relieved it did n't result in a penalty kick for tunisia . five minutes later shevchenko trickled passed his defenders to come clean with boumnijel in the tunisian goal .
the keeper made himself big and followed shevchenko 's move well , something that karim hagui should have considered before bringing down the ukrainian striker who rather easily got his penalty .
the ac milan star went up to the spot and placed the ball behind boumnijel without much effort . even down a goal , the expected tunisian onslaught for an equalizer never materialized .
not even the entrance of brazilian born star striker dos santos with 11 minutes left could ratchet up the pace . spain beat saudi-arabia to win group h in the other group h game , a spanish team with much of their first string resting on the bench beat saudi-arabia in kaiserslautern to defend their top slot in the group . spain and ukraine 's next opponents will be decided in friday 's final set of group round matches .
they could face switzerland , south korea or france . dw staff -lrb- per -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de sheva views crucial tunisia match ; torres sits out saudi game andriy shevchenko has got his groove back just in time as ukraine need a win friday against tunisia to reach the last 16 .

a sleeping pill of a game sees ukraine stumble forward -pipe- match reports -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 23.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese for africa romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 03.05.2011 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio about dw-radio what 's on ?
reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 23.06.2006 a sleeping pill of a game sees ukraine stumble forward großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : ukraine celebrate their trip to world cup 's the round of 16 the ukrainian and tunisian fans who came to berlin hoping to see their team advance were given a poor show as ukraine , with the help of a penalty , managed an uneventful 1-0 victory to see them through to the last 16 . the ukraine were seen as favorites to win this game , and so they did , but not without some luck . anis ayari hit a free-kick in the 64th minute for tunisia that was deflected just over the crossbar by a ukrainian hand in the wall .
that could have been a penalty for the tunisians at a crucial moment in a still goalless match . total lack of creativity the game played in front of a predominantly neutral crowd but with sections of ukrainian blue and yellow joined by flecks of tunisian red , never took off .
in the second minute andriy voronin stole the ball to build up a two-against-one but as he passed the ball sloppily , and it never reached its address bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : ukranian fans did n't have much to watch in the thrid group match the rest of the game continued in similar fashion .
few chances were created .
in fact the word " create " can not really be used to describe the match that was mainly a display of long balls , mistakes and a lot of ping pong at midfield . hatem trabelsi , the tunisian skipper , tried in the first twenty minutes to make a difference .
with good pace , a rarity in this game , he went through a couple of times on the right wing to deliver his crosses , but they never posed any serious threat to shovkovsky in the ukraine goal . between the 21st and the 27th minute the ukrainians raised the tempo in a six-minute stint that featured actual combinations that put pressure on the tunisian defense .
what ended this offensive push so quickly remains a mystery . why they did n't come back after the break with the urge to win is an even bigger one , as they were a man up after tunisia 's only striker , ziad jaziri , was given the red card on stoppage time in first half . penalty and no penalty needed to decide the match bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : a penalty kick was the only goal of a game both teams needed to win the second half provided more of the same , although it 's likely the ukrainians were told to stand higher up in the field , something that swung the game slightly in favor of the world cup newcomers .
their side had more possession but did little to open up the scoring . instead it was tunisia who got a good chance in the 64th minute with a free-kick only a couple of meters outside the ukrainian penalty box .
ayari struck it well , but the replay showed it was deflected by voronin 's hand , and the ukrainians must be relieved it did n't result in a penalty kick for tunisia . five minutes later shevchenko trickled passed his defenders to come clean with boumnijel in the tunisian goal .
the keeper made himself big and followed shevchenko 's move well , something that karim hagui should have considered before bringing down the ukrainian striker who rather easily got his penalty .
the ac milan star went up to the spot and placed the ball behind boumnijel without much effort . even down a goal , the expected tunisian onslaught for an equalizer never materialized .
not even the entrance of brazilian born star striker dos santos with 11 minutes left could ratchet up the pace . spain beat saudi-arabia to win group h in the other group h game , a spanish team with much of their first string resting on the bench beat saudi-arabia in kaiserslautern to defend their top slot in the group . spain and ukraine 's next opponents will be decided in friday 's final set of group round matches .
they could face switzerland , south korea or france . dw staff -lrb- per -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de sheva views crucial tunisia match ; torres sits out saudi game andriy shevchenko has got his groove back just in time as ukraine need a win friday against tunisia to reach the last 16 .
qualified spain are so relaxed that fernando torres and others will sit out the saudi arabia game .
-lrb- june 23 , 2006 -rrb- ukraine hit their own four goal fest as saudi arabia crash out on the wrong end of a 4-0 thrashing in their debut game , ukraine wanted saudi arabia to know exactly how that felt and meted out a four goal rout of their own which could have been many , many more in hamburg .
-lrb- june 19 , 2006 -rrb- live ticker : ukraine 1:0 tunisia review all the game 's details with the dw-world.de live ticker .
feedback what did you think of the games ?
send us an e-mail .
please include your name and country in your reply .

program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 23.06.2006 a sleeping pill of a game sees ukraine stumble forward großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : ukraine celebrate their trip to world cup 's the round of 16 the ukrainian and tunisian fans who came to berlin hoping to see their team advance were given a poor show as ukraine , with the help of a penalty , managed an uneventful 1-0 victory to see them through to the last 16 . the ukraine were seen as favorites to win this game , and so they did , but not without some luck . anis ayari hit a free-kick in the 64th minute for tunisia that was deflected just over the crossbar by a ukrainian hand in the wall .
that could have been a penalty for the tunisians at a crucial moment in a still goalless match . total lack of creativity the game played in front of a predominantly neutral crowd but with sections of ukrainian blue and yellow joined by flecks of tunisian red , never took off .
in the second minute andriy voronin stole the ball to build up a two-against-one but as he passed the ball sloppily , and it never reached its address bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : ukranian fans did n't have much to watch in the thrid group match the rest of the game continued in similar fashion .
few chances were created .
in fact the word " create " can not really be used to describe the match that was mainly a display of long balls , mistakes and a lot of ping pong at midfield . hatem trabelsi , the tunisian skipper , tried in the first twenty minutes to make a difference .
with good pace , a rarity in this game , he went through a couple of times on the right wing to deliver his crosses , but they never posed any serious threat to shovkovsky in the ukraine goal . between the 21st and the 27th minute the ukrainians raised the tempo in a six-minute stint that featured actual combinations that put pressure on the tunisian defense .
what ended this offensive push so quickly remains a mystery . why they did n't come back after the break with the urge to win is an even bigger one , as they were a man up after tunisia 's only striker , ziad jaziri , was given the red card on stoppage time in first half . penalty and no penalty needed to decide the match bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : a penalty kick was the only goal of a game both teams needed to win the second half provided more of the same , although it 's likely the ukrainians were told to stand higher up in the field , something that swung the game slightly in favor of the world cup newcomers .
their side had more possession but did little to open up the scoring . instead it was tunisia who got a good chance in the 64th minute with a free-kick only a couple of meters outside the ukrainian penalty box .
ayari struck it well , but the replay showed it was deflected by voronin 's hand , and the ukrainians must be relieved it did n't result in a penalty kick for tunisia . five minutes later shevchenko trickled passed his defenders to come clean with boumnijel in the tunisian goal .
the keeper made himself big and followed shevchenko 's move well , something that karim hagui should have considered before bringing down the ukrainian striker who rather easily got his penalty .
the ac milan star went up to the spot and placed the ball behind boumnijel without much effort . even down a goal , the expected tunisian onslaught for an equalizer never materialized .
not even the entrance of brazilian born star striker dos santos with 11 minutes left could ratchet up the pace . spain beat saudi-arabia to win group h in the other group h game , a spanish team with much of their first string resting on the bench beat saudi-arabia in kaiserslautern to defend their top slot in the group . spain and ukraine 's next opponents will be decided in friday 's final set of group round matches .
they could face switzerland , south korea or france . dw staff -lrb- per -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de sheva views crucial tunisia match ; torres sits out saudi game andriy shevchenko has got his groove back just in time as ukraine need a win friday against tunisia to reach the last 16 .
qualified spain are so relaxed that fernando torres and others will sit out the saudi arabia game .
-lrb- june 23 , 2006 -rrb- ukraine hit their own four goal fest as saudi arabia crash out on the wrong end of a 4-0 thrashing in their debut game , ukraine wanted saudi arabia to know exactly how that felt and meted out a four goal rout of their own which could have been many , many more in hamburg .

a sleeping pill of a game sees ukraine stumble forward -pipe- match reports -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 23.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 28.09.2010 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?
programs reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 23.06.2006 a sleeping pill of a game sees ukraine stumble forward großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : ukraine celebrate their trip to world cup 's the round of 16 the ukrainian and tunisian fans who came to berlin hoping to see their team advance were given a poor show as ukraine , with the help of a penalty , managed an uneventful 1-0 victory to see them through to the last 16 . the ukraine were seen as favorites to win this game , and so they did , but not without some luck . anis ayari hit a free-kick in the 64th minute for tunisia that was deflected just over the crossbar by a ukrainian hand in the wall .
that could have been a penalty for the tunisians at a crucial moment in a still goalless match . total lack of creativity the game played in front of a predominantly neutral crowd but with sections of ukrainian blue and yellow joined by flecks of tunisian red , never took off .
in the second minute andriy voronin stole the ball to build up a two-against-one but as he passed the ball sloppily , and it never reached its address bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : ukranian fans did n't have much to watch in the thrid group match the rest of the game continued in similar fashion .
few chances were created .
in fact the word " create " can not really be used to describe the match that was mainly a display of long balls , mistakes and a lot of ping pong at midfield . hatem trabelsi , the tunisian skipper , tried in the first twenty minutes to make a difference .
with good pace , a rarity in this game , he went through a couple of times on the right wing to deliver his crosses , but they never posed any serious threat to shovkovsky in the ukraine goal . between the 21st and the 27th minute the ukrainians raised the tempo in a six-minute stint that featured actual combinations that put pressure on the tunisian defense .
what ended this offensive push so quickly remains a mystery . why they did n't come back after the break with the urge to win is an even bigger one , as they were a man up after tunisia 's only striker , ziad jaziri , was given the red card on stoppage time in first half . penalty and no penalty needed to decide the match bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : a penalty kick was the only goal of a game both teams needed to win the second half provided more of the same , although it 's likely the ukrainians were told to stand higher up in the field , something that swung the game slightly in favor of the world cup newcomers .
their side had more possession but did little to open up the scoring . instead it was tunisia who got a good chance in the 64th minute with a free-kick only a couple of meters outside the ukrainian penalty box .
ayari struck it well , but the replay showed it was deflected by voronin 's hand , and the ukrainians must be relieved it did n't result in a penalty kick for tunisia . five minutes later shevchenko trickled passed his defenders to come clean with boumnijel in the tunisian goal .
the keeper made himself big and followed shevchenko 's move well , something that karim hagui should have considered before bringing down the ukrainian striker who rather easily got his penalty .
the ac milan star went up to the spot and placed the ball behind boumnijel without much effort . even down a goal , the expected tunisian onslaught for an equalizer never materialized .
not even the entrance of brazilian born star striker dos santos with 11 minutes left could ratchet up the pace . spain beat saudi-arabia to win group h in the other group h game , a spanish team with much of their first string resting on the bench beat saudi-arabia in kaiserslautern to defend their top slot in the group . spain and ukraine 's next opponents will be decided in friday 's final set of group round matches .
they could face switzerland , south korea or france . dw staff -lrb- per -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de sheva views crucial tunisia match ; torres sits out saudi game andriy shevchenko has got his groove back just in time as ukraine need a win friday against tunisia to reach the last 16 .
qualified spain are so relaxed that fernando torres and others will sit out the saudi arabia game .
-lrb- june 23 , 2006 -rrb- ukraine hit their own four goal fest as saudi arabia crash out on the wrong end of a 4-0 thrashing in their debut game , ukraine wanted saudi arabia to know exactly how that felt and meted out a four goal rout of their own which could have been many , many more in hamburg .
-lrb- june 19 , 2006 -rrb- live ticker : ukraine 1:0 tunisia review all the game 's details with the dw-world.de live ticker .
feedback what did you think of the games ?
send us an e-mail .
please include your name and country in your reply .

program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 23.06.2006 a sleeping pill of a game sees ukraine stumble forward großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : ukraine celebrate their trip to world cup 's the round of 16 the ukrainian and tunisian fans who came to berlin hoping to see their team advance were given a poor show as ukraine , with the help of a penalty , managed an uneventful 1-0 victory to see them through to the last 16 . the ukraine were seen as favorites to win this game , and so they did , but not without some luck . anis ayari hit a free-kick in the 64th minute for tunisia that was deflected just over the crossbar by a ukrainian hand in the wall .
that could have been a penalty for the tunisians at a crucial moment in a still goalless match . total lack of creativity the game played in front of a predominantly neutral crowd but with sections of ukrainian blue and yellow joined by flecks of tunisian red , never took off .
in the second minute andriy voronin stole the ball to build up a two-against-one but as he passed the ball sloppily , and it never reached its address bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : ukranian fans did n't have much to watch in the thrid group match the rest of the game continued in similar fashion .
few chances were created .
in fact the word " create " can not really be used to describe the match that was mainly a display of long balls , mistakes and a lot of ping pong at midfield . hatem trabelsi , the tunisian skipper , tried in the first twenty minutes to make a difference .
with good pace , a rarity in this game , he went through a couple of times on the right wing to deliver his crosses , but they never posed any serious threat to shovkovsky in the ukraine goal . between the 21st and the 27th minute the ukrainians raised the tempo in a six-minute stint that featured actual combinations that put pressure on the tunisian defense .
what ended this offensive push so quickly remains a mystery . why they did n't come back after the break with the urge to win is an even bigger one , as they were a man up after tunisia 's only striker , ziad jaziri , was given the red card on stoppage time in first half . penalty and no penalty needed to decide the match bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : a penalty kick was the only goal of a game both teams needed to win the second half provided more of the same , although it 's likely the ukrainians were told to stand higher up in the field , something that swung the game slightly in favor of the world cup newcomers .
their side had more possession but did little to open up the scoring . instead it was tunisia who got a good chance in the 64th minute with a free-kick only a couple of meters outside the ukrainian penalty box .
ayari struck it well , but the replay showed it was deflected by voronin 's hand , and the ukrainians must be relieved it did n't result in a penalty kick for tunisia . five minutes later shevchenko trickled passed his defenders to come clean with boumnijel in the tunisian goal .
the keeper made himself big and followed shevchenko 's move well , something that karim hagui should have considered before bringing down the ukrainian striker who rather easily got his penalty .
the ac milan star went up to the spot and placed the ball behind boumnijel without much effort . even down a goal , the expected tunisian onslaught for an equalizer never materialized .
not even the entrance of brazilian born star striker dos santos with 11 minutes left could ratchet up the pace . spain beat saudi-arabia to win group h in the other group h game , a spanish team with much of their first string resting on the bench beat saudi-arabia in kaiserslautern to defend their top slot in the group . spain and ukraine 's next opponents will be decided in friday 's final set of group round matches .
they could face switzerland , south korea or france . dw staff -lrb- per -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de sheva views crucial tunisia match ; torres sits out saudi game andriy shevchenko has got his groove back just in time as ukraine need a win friday against tunisia to reach the last 16 .
qualified spain are so relaxed that fernando torres and others will sit out the saudi arabia game .
-lrb- june 23 , 2006 -rrb- ukraine hit their own four goal fest as saudi arabia crash out on the wrong end of a 4-0 thrashing in their debut game , ukraine wanted saudi arabia to know exactly how that felt and meted out a four goal rout of their own which could have been many , many more in hamburg .

live ticker : ukraine 1:0 tunisia -pipe- match reports -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 23.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 29.09.2010 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?
programs reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 23.06.2006 live ticker : ukraine 1:0 tunisia review all the game highlights with the dw-world.de live ticker . welcome to the dw-world.de live ticker .
the group h clash will decide who joins likely group winners spain in the knockout stage .
tunisia need a win to make virtually certain they claim the second spot while ukraine are likely to require only a draw .
dw-world.de will give you all the action from the game between ukraine , world cup debutants , and tunisia , looking for their first win in a world cup game since 1978 .
we will also give you highlights from the other group h game between saudi-arabia and spain .
the line-ups .
ukraine -lrb- 3-5-2 -rrb- : 1-oleksander shovkovsky ; 6-andriy rusol , 22-vyacheslav svidersky , 2-andriy nesmachny ; 9-oleg gusev , 4-anatoly tymoshchyuk , 8-oleg shelayev , 19-maxim kalinichenko , 11-serhiy rebrov ; 7-andriy shevchenko , 10-andriy voronin coach : oleg blokhin tunisia -lrb- 4-5-1 -rrb- : 1-ali boumnijel ; 6-hatem trabelsi , 15-radhi jaidi , 3-karim hagui , 19-anis ayari ; 20-hamed namouchi , 12-joahar mnari , 14-adel chedli , 8-medhi nafti , 13-riadh bouazizi ; 5-ziad jaziri coach : roger lemerre referee : carlos amarilla -lrb- paraguay -rrb- about ten minutes to kick-off .
tunisia again have to start without their injured striker dos santos .
the players are entering the pitch .
the blue and yellow fans of ukraine are dancing and singing .
they are in majority but part of the stadium is red and waving the tunisian flag .
the anthems have been played .
the players shake hands .
1. min .
tunisia kick off .
1. min .
a long ball down to shevchenko on the right is the first attempt in the game .
2. min .
what a chance for ukraine .
jaidi screws up outside the box for voronin to steal the ball .
the ukraine comes two against one but voronin 's pass is sloppy .
4. min .
a free-kick from kalininchenko from the left goes well over goal .
5. min .
nafti almost finds jaziri running into the box .
7. min .
ukraine have managed to get a small grip on the events but both teams have started rather carefully and mistakes are not few on either side .
8. min .
jaziri gets booked for falling lightly in the box .
9. min .
the tunisians are trying to go through on the right with trabelsi , who has managed to go around the ukraine defense a couple of times to deliver the cross .
11. min .
the teams are in no hurry .
ukraine are playing a lot of long balls from the defense but they have n't caused the tunisians any real problems yet .
13. min .
trabelsi again .
the tunisian gets the ball down at the right flag and dribbles his way into the box where he loses the ball .
13. min .
jaidi gets a shot but it flies high over shovkovsky 's goal .
15. min .
a wall pass opens up the tunisian defense and creates some confusion that leads to a free-kick for the ukrainians .
shevchenko hits it far though .
17. min .
svidersky sees yellow .
18. min .
the tunisian free-kick is hit on goal but the ukrainian keeper is well positioned and has no problems .
20. min .
if one of the teams decided to raise the tempo they would probably give the opponents such a shock they would n't understand what happened .
21. min .
at last some action .
the ukrainians suddenly do push the tempo and the result is the best chance so far .
tymoshchyuk gets a good shot on goal from within the box .
boumnijel in the tunisian goal has to prove himself .
24. min .
in the last three minutes the ukrainians have started combinig and have found their way into the box on several occasions .
nothing really dangerous so far though .
27. min .
we 're still not at light speed but the game is slightly more thrilling at the moment .
28. min .
the crowd finding ways of entertainment .
the wave performed in the stands is louder and more exciting than the game obviously .
30. min .
a corner for the tunisians .
nothing else to report .
come on now teams ! 31. min .
shevchenko through .
a well balanced chip finds the ukrainian striker 's foot on the box line .
it looks as he is past his two defenders but somehow loses the ball before having a chance to finish .
33. min .
tunisians combine nicely .
no result though .
not even a shot .
35. min .
an ukrainian free-kick lands on the goal roof .
37. min .
the ukrainians are walking the thinner line .
if tunisia were to score it could prove fatal as it might be hard to switch pace later .
38. min .
jaidi seem to have hurt himself suddenly .
the tunisian defender limps to the sideline 39. min .
trabelsi gets a good cross in from the right and it lands in front of goal between two ukrainians and jaziri who ca n't reach it .
trabelsi has been the one tunisian player who stands out a bit .
42. min .
some booing and whistling reach the pitch .
42. min .
bouazizi booked .
44. min .
shevchenko fiddles about with the ball in the box .
has someone put sleeping pills in the water bottles around the pitch ? 45 + 1. min .
jaziri leaves the pitch after an attack on shelayev .
45 + 1. min .
first half ends .
shelayev rockets a shot from twenty five meters just before the sending off of jaziri .
the shot is the last -lrb- and almost only -rrb- real attempt on goal in this boring first half .
the players are back on the pitch .
let 's hope it 's a better second half .
45. min .
second half gets underway with ukraine kicking off .
46. min .
shelayev booked for bringing down trabelsi .
48. min .
no signs of a speedier more exhilarating game in the first few minutes .
the teams are still impersonating the living dead .
50. min .
more long balls from the ukrainians .
this one reaches voronin on the right but he has no time before the tunisian defense is all around him .
52. min .
more unhappy whistling from the stands .
the ukrainian fans are wondering why no one is in the tunisian box when the cross comes flying in .
54. min .
rebrov leaves for vorobey .
56. min .
trying to be optimistic , you could say that both defenses are tight , but in all honesty they have not had much serious threat to fight off .
58. min .
the ukrainians have positioned themselves higher up the field to try to gain early control and it seems to be working .
ukraine have more possession but are still extremely sloppy .
60. min .
tymoshchyuk booked .
62. min .
you might want to ask the ukrainians why , with one man more on the pitch , they do n't try to secure their place in the last sixteen .
63. min .
an ukrainian cross from the right almost reaches the two strikers in the box .
63. min .
rusol sees yellow .
free-kick for tunisia just outside the box .
64. min .
ayari hits a nice free-kick .
the tunisian gets the ball over the wall and it dives down nicely but lands in the net just over the crossbar .
66. min .
in fact ayari 's free-kick deflects off an ukrainian arm .
that could have ended with a penalty .
69. min .
penalty for ukraine ! ! 69. min .
shevchenko hits the penalty home .
the striker was the one who passed the tunisian goalie in the box and who was brought down by hagui .
now his kick could take ukraine to the last sixteen .
72. min .
could this be a wake-up call for the tunisian team who had just started to build up some pace after ayari 's free-kick earlier ? 74. min .
kalinichenko goes out for gusin .
76. min .
the game keeps rolling like it has most of the time .
much like a steam train .
79. min .
dos santos goes on for chedli and ben saada for bouazizi in a double bill .
81. min .
can the tunisian star striker , who so unfortunately have n't been able to play so far in the world cup , change things ? 83. min .
it does n't look like tunisia have anything up the sleeve .
and as the cameras focus on a nearly sleeping fifa boss , it is clear that even the extremist soccer fans have trouble getting enthusiastic about this game .
85. min .
trabelsi gets a chance .
the tunisian captain , the only player in his team to show some talent today , fires off a shot from the right side of the box .
it goes wide .
86. min .
shevchenko leaves for milevsky .
88. min .
voronin gets a chance to score .
the ukrainian striker wall passes his way in and gets a decent shot on the way but boumnijel saves .
89. min .
jaidi sees yellow .
90. min .
nafti goes for ghodbane .
90 + 1. min .
dos santos .
that 's close .
a free-kick lands in the box where players have fallen on the pitch .
the ball then reaches dos santos who heads it just to the left .
90 + 3. min .
game over .
voronin gets a last chance from within the box as he receives a cross , turns and shoots about a meter wide .
that was the end of the perhaps least interesting game of the world cup so far .
it means the ukraine are through together with spain who beat saudi arabia to finalize group h. dw staff -lrb- per -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic feedback send us an e-mail .
please include your name and country in your reply .

world cup 2006 stadiums from the fringe have a laugh read about quirky happenings in thigh-slappin ' germany in this dw-world.de dossier .

live ticker : ukraine 1:0 tunisia -pipe- match reports -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 23.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 05.11.2010 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?
programs reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 23.06.2006 live ticker : ukraine 1:0 tunisia review all the game highlights with the dw-world.de live ticker . welcome to the dw-world.de live ticker .
the group h clash will decide who joins likely group winners spain in the knockout stage .
tunisia need a win to make virtually certain they claim the second spot while ukraine are likely to require only a draw .
dw-world.de will give you all the action from the game between ukraine , world cup debutants , and tunisia , looking for their first win in a world cup game since 1978 .
we will also give you highlights from the other group h game between saudi-arabia and spain .
the line-ups .
ukraine -lrb- 3-5-2 -rrb- : 1-oleksander shovkovsky ; 6-andriy rusol , 22-vyacheslav svidersky , 2-andriy nesmachny ; 9-oleg gusev , 4-anatoly tymoshchyuk , 8-oleg shelayev , 19-maxim kalinichenko , 11-serhiy rebrov ; 7-andriy shevchenko , 10-andriy voronin coach : oleg blokhin tunisia -lrb- 4-5-1 -rrb- : 1-ali boumnijel ; 6-hatem trabelsi , 15-radhi jaidi , 3-karim hagui , 19-anis ayari ; 20-hamed namouchi , 12-joahar mnari , 14-adel chedli , 8-medhi nafti , 13-riadh bouazizi ; 5-ziad jaziri coach : roger lemerre referee : carlos amarilla -lrb- paraguay -rrb- about ten minutes to kick-off .
tunisia again have to start without their injured striker dos santos .
the players are entering the pitch .
the blue and yellow fans of ukraine are dancing and singing .
they are in majority but part of the stadium is red and waving the tunisian flag .
the anthems have been played .
the players shake hands .
1. min .
tunisia kick off .
1. min .
a long ball down to shevchenko on the right is the first attempt in the game .
2. min .
what a chance for ukraine .
jaidi screws up outside the box for voronin to steal the ball .
the ukraine comes two against one but voronin 's pass is sloppy .
4. min .
a free-kick from kalininchenko from the left goes well over goal .
5. min .
nafti almost finds jaziri running into the box .
7. min .
ukraine have managed to get a small grip on the events but both teams have started rather carefully and mistakes are not few on either side .
8. min .
jaziri gets booked for falling lightly in the box .
9. min .
the tunisians are trying to go through on the right with trabelsi , who has managed to go around the ukraine defense a couple of times to deliver the cross .
11. min .
the teams are in no hurry .
ukraine are playing a lot of long balls from the defense but they have n't caused the tunisians any real problems yet .
13. min .
trabelsi again .
the tunisian gets the ball down at the right flag and dribbles his way into the box where he loses the ball .
13. min .
jaidi gets a shot but it flies high over shovkovsky 's goal .
15. min .
a wall pass opens up the tunisian defense and creates some confusion that leads to a free-kick for the ukrainians .
shevchenko hits it far though .
17. min .
svidersky sees yellow .
18. min .
the tunisian free-kick is hit on goal but the ukrainian keeper is well positioned and has no problems .
20. min .
if one of the teams decided to raise the tempo they would probably give the opponents such a shock they would n't understand what happened .
21. min .
at last some action .
the ukrainians suddenly do push the tempo and the result is the best chance so far .
tymoshchyuk gets a good shot on goal from within the box .
boumnijel in the tunisian goal has to prove himself .
24. min .
in the last three minutes the ukrainians have started combinig and have found their way into the box on several occasions .
nothing really dangerous so far though .
27. min .
we 're still not at light speed but the game is slightly more thrilling at the moment .
28. min .
the crowd finding ways of entertainment .
the wave performed in the stands is louder and more exciting than the game obviously .
30. min .
a corner for the tunisians .
nothing else to report .
come on now teams ! 31. min .
shevchenko through .
a well balanced chip finds the ukrainian striker 's foot on the box line .
it looks as he is past his two defenders but somehow loses the ball before having a chance to finish .

no result though .
not even a shot .

88. min .
voronin gets a chance to score .
the ukrainian striker wall passes his way in and gets a decent shot on the way but boumnijel saves .
89. min .
jaidi sees yellow .
90. min .
nafti goes for ghodbane .
90 + 1. min .
dos santos .
that 's close .
a free-kick lands in the box where players have fallen on the pitch .
the ball then reaches dos santos who heads it just to the left .
90 + 3. min .
game over .
voronin gets a last chance from within the box as he receives a cross , turns and shoots about a meter wide .
that was the end of the perhaps least interesting game of the world cup so far .
it means the ukraine are through together with spain who beat saudi arabia to finalize group h. dw staff -lrb- per -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic feedback send us an e-mail .
please include your name and country in your reply .

world cup 2006 stadiums from the fringe have a laugh read about quirky happenings in thigh-slappin ' germany in this dw-world.de dossier .

<p>
live ticker : ukraine 1:0 tunisia -pipe- match reports -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 23.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese for africa romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 02.05.2011 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio about dw-radio what 's on ?
reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 23.06.2006 live ticker : ukraine 1:0 tunisia review all the game highlights with the dw-world.de live ticker . welcome to the dw-world.de live ticker .
the group h clash will decide who joins likely group winners spain in the knockout stage .
tunisia need a win to make virtually certain they claim the second spot while ukraine are likely to require only a draw .
dw-world.de will give you all the action from the game between ukraine , world cup debutants , and tunisia , looking for their first win in a world cup game since 1978 .
we will also give you highlights from the other group h game between saudi-arabia and spain .
the line-ups .
ukraine -lrb- 3-5-2 -rrb- : 1-oleksander shovkovsky ; 6-andriy rusol , 22-vyacheslav svidersky , 2-andriy nesmachny ; 9-oleg gusev , 4-anatoly tymoshchyuk , 8-oleg shelayev , 19-maxim kalinichenko , 11-serhiy rebrov ; 7-andriy shevchenko , 10-andriy voronin coach : oleg blokhin tunisia -lrb- 4-5-1 -rrb- : 1-ali boumnijel ; 6-hatem trabelsi , 15-radhi jaidi , 3-karim hagui , 19-anis ayari ; 20-hamed namouchi , 12-joahar mnari , 14-adel chedli , 8-medhi nafti , 13-riadh bouazizi ; 5-ziad jaziri coach : roger lemerre referee : carlos amarilla -lrb- paraguay -rrb- about ten minutes to kick-off .
tunisia again have to start without their injured striker dos santos .
the players are entering the pitch .
the blue and yellow fans of ukraine are dancing and singing .
they are in majority but part of the stadium is red and waving the tunisian flag .
the anthems have been played .
the players shake hands .
1. min .
tunisia kick off .
1. min .
a long ball down to shevchenko on the right is the first attempt in the game .
2. min .
what a chance for ukraine .
jaidi screws up outside the box for voronin to steal the ball .
the ukraine comes two against one but voronin 's pass is sloppy .
4. min .
a free-kick from kalininchenko from the left goes well over goal .
5. min .
nafti almost finds jaziri running into the box .
7. min .
ukraine have managed to get a small grip on the events but both teams have started rather carefully and mistakes are not few on either side .
8. min .
jaziri gets booked for falling lightly in the box .
9. min .
the tunisians are trying to go through on the right with trabelsi , who has managed to go around the ukraine defense a couple of times to deliver the cross .
11. min .
the teams are in no hurry .
ukraine are playing a lot of long balls from the defense but they have n't caused the tunisians any real problems yet .
13. min .
trabelsi again .
the tunisian gets the ball down at the right flag and dribbles his way into the box where he loses the ball .
13. min .
jaidi gets a shot but it flies high over shovkovsky 's goal .
15. min .
a wall pass opens up the tunisian defense and creates some confusion that leads to a free-kick for the ukrainians .
shevchenko hits it far though .
17. min .
svidersky sees yellow .
18. min .
the tunisian free-kick is hit on goal but the ukrainian keeper is well positioned and has no problems .
20. min .
if one of the teams decided to raise the tempo they would probably give the opponents such a shock they would n't understand what happened .
21. min .
at last some action .
the ukrainians suddenly do push the tempo and the result is the best chance so far .
tymoshchyuk gets a good shot on goal from within the box .
boumnijel in the tunisian goal has to prove himself .
24. min .
in the last three minutes the ukrainians have started combinig and have found their way into the box on several occasions .
nothing really dangerous so far though .
27. min .
we 're still not at light speed but the game is slightly more thrilling at the moment .
28. min .
the crowd finding ways of entertainment .
the wave performed in the stands is louder and more exciting than the game obviously .
30. min .
a corner for the tunisians .
nothing else to report .
come on now teams ! 31. min .
shevchenko through .
a well balanced chip finds the ukrainian striker 's foot on the box line .
it looks as he is past his two defenders but somehow loses the ball before having a chance to finish .
33. min .
tunisians combine nicely .
no result though .
not even a shot .
35. min .
an ukrainian free-kick lands on the goal roof .
37. min .
the ukrainians are walking the thinner line .
if tunisia were to score it could prove fatal as it might be hard to switch pace later .
38. min .
jaidi seem to have hurt himself suddenly .
the tunisian defender limps to the sideline 39. min .
trabelsi gets a good cross in from the right and it lands in front of goal between two ukrainians and jaziri who ca n't reach it .
trabelsi has been the one tunisian player who stands out a bit .
42. min .
some booing and whistling reach the pitch .
42. min .
bouazizi booked .
44. min .
shevchenko fiddles about with the ball in the box .
has someone put sleeping pills in the water bottles around the pitch ? 45 + 1. min .
jaziri leaves the pitch after an attack on shelayev .
45 + 1. min .
first half ends .
shelayev rockets a shot from twenty five meters just before the sending off of jaziri .
the shot is the last -lrb- and almost only -rrb- real attempt on goal in this boring first half .
the players are back on the pitch .
let 's hope it 's a better second half .
45. min .
second half gets underway with ukraine kicking off .
46. min .
shelayev booked for bringing down trabelsi .
48. min .
no signs of a speedier more exhilarating game in the first few minutes .
the teams are still impersonating the living dead .
50. min .
more long balls from the ukrainians .
this one reaches voronin on the right but he has no time before the tunisian defense is all around him .
52. min .
more unhappy whistling from the stands .
the ukrainian fans are wondering why no one is in the tunisian box when the cross comes flying in .
54. min .
rebrov leaves for vorobey .
56. min .
trying to be optimistic , you could say that both defenses are tight , but in all honesty they have not had much serious threat to fight off .
58. min .
the ukrainians have positioned themselves higher up the field to try to gain early control and it seems to be working .
ukraine have more possession but are still extremely sloppy .
60. min .
tymoshchyuk booked .
62. min .
you might want to ask the ukrainians why , with one man more on the pitch , they do n't try to secure their place in the last sixteen .
63. min .
an ukrainian cross from the right almost reaches the two strikers in the box .
63. min .
rusol sees yellow .
free-kick for tunisia just outside the box .
64. min .
ayari hits a nice free-kick .
the tunisian gets the ball over the wall and it dives down nicely but lands in the net just over the crossbar .
66. min .
in fact ayari 's free-kick deflects off an ukrainian arm .
that could have ended with a penalty .
69. min .
penalty for ukraine ! ! 69. min .
shevchenko hits the penalty home .
the striker was the one who passed the tunisian goalie in the box and who was brought down by hagui .
now his kick could take ukraine to the last sixteen .
72. min .
could this be a wake-up call for the tunisian team who had just started to build up some pace after ayari 's free-kick earlier ? 74. min .
kalinichenko goes out for gusin .
76. min .
the game keeps rolling like it has most of the time .
much like a steam train .
79. min .
dos santos goes on for chedli and ben saada for bouazizi in a double bill .
81. min .
can the tunisian star striker , who so unfortunately have n't been able to play so far in the world cup , change things ? 83. min .
it does n't look like tunisia have anything up the sleeve .
and as the cameras focus on a nearly sleeping fifa boss , it is clear that even the extremist soccer fans have trouble getting enthusiastic about this game .
85. min .
trabelsi gets a chance .
the tunisian captain , the only player in his team to show some talent today , fires off a shot from the right side of the box .
it goes wide .
86. min .
shevchenko leaves for milevsky .
88. min .
voronin gets a chance to score .
the ukrainian striker wall passes his way in and gets a decent shot on the way but boumnijel saves .
89. min .
jaidi sees yellow .
90. min .
nafti goes for ghodbane .
90 + 1. min .
dos santos .
that 's close .
a free-kick lands in the box where players have fallen on the pitch .
the ball then reaches dos santos who heads it just to the left .
90 + 3. min .
game over .
voronin gets a last chance from within the box as he receives a cross , turns and shoots about a meter wide .
that was the end of the perhaps least interesting game of the world cup so far .
it means the ukraine are through together with spain who beat saudi arabia to finalize group h. dw staff -lrb- per -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic feedback send us an e-mail .
please include your name and country in your reply .

if one of the teams decided to raise the tempo they would probably give the opponents such a shock they would n't understand what happened .
21. min .
at last some action .
the ukrainians suddenly do push the tempo and the result is the best chance so far .
tymoshchyuk gets a good shot on goal from within the box .
boumnijel in the tunisian goal has to prove himself .
24. min .
in the last three minutes the ukrainians have started combinig and have found their way into the box on several occasions .
nothing really dangerous so far though .
27. min .
we 're still not at light speed but the game is slightly more thrilling at the moment .
28. min .
the crowd finding ways of entertainment .
the wave performed in the stands is louder and more exciting than the game obviously .
30. min .
a corner for the tunisians .
nothing else to report .
come on now teams ! 31. min .
shevchenko through .
a well balanced chip finds the ukrainian striker 's foot on the box line .
it looks as he is past his two defenders but somehow loses the ball before having a chance to finish .
33. min .
tunisians combine nicely .
no result though .
not even a shot .
35. min .
an ukrainian free-kick lands on the goal roof .
37. min .
the ukrainians are walking the thinner line .
if tunisia were to score it could prove fatal as it might be hard to switch pace later .
38. min .
jaidi seem to have hurt himself suddenly .
the tunisian defender limps to the sideline 39. min .
trabelsi gets a good cross in from the right and it lands in front of goal between two ukrainians and jaziri who ca n't reach it .
trabelsi has been the one tunisian player who stands out a bit .
42. min .
some booing and whistling reach the pitch .
42. min .
bouazizi booked .
44. min .
shevchenko fiddles about with the ball in the box .
has someone put sleeping pills in the water bottles around the pitch ? 45 + 1. min .
jaziri leaves the pitch after an attack on shelayev .
45 + 1. min .
first half ends .
shelayev rockets a shot from twenty five meters just before the sending off of jaziri .
the shot is the last -lrb- and almost only -rrb- real attempt on goal in this boring first half .
the players are back on the pitch .
let 's hope it 's a better second half .
45. min .
second half gets underway with ukraine kicking off .
46. min .
shelayev booked for bringing down trabelsi .
48. min .
no signs of a speedier more exhilarating game in the first few minutes .
the teams are still impersonating the living dead .
50. min .
more long balls from the ukrainians .
this one reaches voronin on the right but he has no time before the tunisian defense is all around him .
52. min .
more unhappy whistling from the stands .
the ukrainian fans are wondering why no one is in the tunisian box when the cross comes flying in .
54. min .
rebrov leaves for vorobey .
56. min .
trying to be optimistic , you could say that both defenses are tight , but in all honesty they have not had much serious threat to fight off .
58. min .
the ukrainians have positioned themselves higher up the field to try to gain early control and it seems to be working .
ukraine have more possession but are still extremely sloppy .
60. min .
tymoshchyuk booked .
62. min .
you might want to ask the ukrainians why , with one man more on the pitch , they do n't try to secure their place in the last sixteen .
63. min .
an ukrainian cross from the right almost reaches the two strikers in the box .
63. min .
rusol sees yellow .
free-kick for tunisia just outside the box .
64. min .
ayari hits a nice free-kick .
the tunisian gets the ball over the wall and it dives down nicely but lands in the net just over the crossbar .
66. min .
in fact ayari 's free-kick deflects off an ukrainian arm .
that could have ended with a penalty .
69. min .
penalty for ukraine ! ! 69. min .
shevchenko hits the penalty home .
the striker was the one who passed the tunisian goalie in the box and who was brought down by hagui .
now his kick could take ukraine to the last sixteen .
72. min .
could this be a wake-up call for the tunisian team who had just started to build up some pace after ayari 's free-kick earlier ? 74. min .
kalinichenko goes out for gusin .
76. min .
the game keeps rolling like it has most of the time .
much like a steam train .
79. min .
dos santos goes on for chedli and ben saada for bouazizi in a double bill .
81. min .
can the tunisian star striker , who so unfortunately have n't been able to play so far in the world cup , change things ? 83. min .
it does n't look like tunisia have anything up the sleeve .
and as the cameras focus on a nearly sleeping fifa boss , it is clear that even the extremist soccer fans have trouble getting enthusiastic about this game .
85. min .
trabelsi gets a chance .
the tunisian captain , the only player in his team to show some talent today , fires off a shot from the right side of the box .
it goes wide .
86. min .
shevchenko leaves for milevsky .
88. min .
voronin gets a chance to score .
the ukrainian striker wall passes his way in and gets a decent shot on the way but boumnijel saves .
89. min .
jaidi sees yellow .
90. min .
nafti goes for ghodbane .
90 + 1. min .
dos santos .
that 's close .
a free-kick lands in the box where players have fallen on the pitch .
the ball then reaches dos santos who heads it just to the left .
90 + 3. min .
game over .
voronin gets a last chance from within the box as he receives a cross , turns and shoots about a meter wide .
that was the end of the perhaps least interesting game of the world cup so far .
it means the ukraine are through together with spain who beat saudi arabia to finalize group h. dw staff -lrb- per -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic feedback send us an e-mail .
please include your name and country in your reply .

three playing for group g progress while togo play for pride -pipe- match reports -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 23.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 15.11.2010 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?
programs reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 23.06.2006 three playing for group g progress while togo play for pride großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : putting on a brave face : south korean fans will join the swiss and french in a nervous wait two teams from south korea , switzerland and france have the chance to make the last 16 of the world cup as group g reaches its conclusion friday .
togo , however , know that the flight home is already booked . south korea will have to conjure up more of their 2002 magic to pull a last 16 place out of the hat with victory over switzerland in their group g crunch match hanover on friday . a comeback win over togo and a much-acclaimed 1-1 draw with 1998 world champions france could be to no avail because of switzerland 's marginally better goal difference which gives them the luxury of just needing a point from the final group fixture . if the koreans lose to the powerful swiss and france beat trouble-plagued togo by two clear goals , the surprise 2002 semi-finalists will go out .
but a win will see them top the group such are the muddling permutations . south korea , who humbled european powerhouses portugal , italy and spain during their glory run four years ago , could still qualify in second place if they draw with switzerland but the players are refusing to dream that togo can achieve a result against the fading but still flair-filled french . other final-day scenarios could result in the drawing of lots to determine whether france or south korea progress to the second round but neither side want to rely on lady luck for their world cup survival . the asian flag bearers are hoping that switzerland might adopt a defensive approach which would play into their hands but their opponents insist they are not crazy enough to set out their stall for a draw . south korea determined to go through bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : the equalizer against france raised south korean hopes " we are determined to defeat switzerland and go through -lrb- to the last 16 -rrb- , " said striker cho jae-jin , whose header across goal set up park ji-sung 's dramatic 81st minute equalizer against france .
" the swiss might relax , thinking they just need a draw .
it could give us a chance to put them under pressure .
we will not need to look at the result of the france-togo game . " hakan yakin made a big impact when he came on as a replacement in the 2-0 triumph over togo and the attacking midfielder is confident that switzerland will not underestimate south korea or play for the draw .
" it 's definitely an advantage for us now that we do n't have to beat south korea , " said yakin , who is now injury-free after a long spell on the sidelines . " it could also be dangerous though because the koreans need to win .
it 's no good us playing for a draw because we saw during their draw with france how dangerous they can be in the last 10 minutes . " the first ever match between the two countries could develop into a battle of wits between south korea 's coach dick advocaat and his opposite number kobi kuhn , who have been hailed as tactical geniuses for their match-altering substitutions . former champions having to dig deep to progress bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : the end of zidane 's international career ?
meanwhile france will meet togo in cologne without suspended skipper zinedine zidane .
but keeper fabien barthez has urged his teammates to forget about the suspended zizou and get on with the job " we ca n't let his absence get us down , we 've got to think about getting a result , think about our game with or without him , " said barthez .
" there 's no room for feelings like that - it 's up to us to adapt . " despite two lethargic performances to date , the goalkeeper insists france are still on track .
" we 're still on target to win the world cup , " a bullish barthez insisted . france are out to erase the memory of their humiliating title defense when they crashed out in the first round four years ago without scoring a goal , but barthez said fear of a repeat debacle four years on was not on their minds . " you should never have fear , you should never have regrets .
you do n't get small teams in the world cup anymore , like you had 10 or 20 years ago , " said barthez , " you ca n't be concerned , you 've got to remain confident and think about winning .
that 's all ! " if france fail to qualify it means the last image of zidane , who is retiring after the finals , wearing a france shirt was of the player throwing his sweatband down on the ground in frustration at his injury time substitution against south korea . dw staff -lrb- nda -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de france face possible elimination after korean fightback france 's ineffectual world cup campaign failed again to spark in leipzig despite taking an early lead and showing a modicum of desire against south korea .
the 1998 champions fell asleep later and were punished .
-lrb- june 18 , 2006 -rrb- switzerland end togo 's world cup adventure togo 's unlikely dreams of world cup success came to an end on monday in a 2-0 loss to switzerland .
the swiss took over the top spot in group g.
-lrb- june 19 , 2006 -rrb- www-links dw-world.de : the 2006 world cup news , match reports , previews and features from the 2006 world cup in germany .
feedback send us an e-mail .
please include your name and country in your reply . picture gallery daily highlights from the world cup the world cup in pictures a nation expects dw-world.de presents germany 's 2006 world cup squad .
